name: Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa
address: New Periferal Road of Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located in Drafaki, 550 metres from Megali Ammos Beach, Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. 10.2 km from Agia Anna Beach, the property features a bar and a garden. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room comes with a coffee machine, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer sea views. At Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast. Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa offers a terrace. Bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 1 km from Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa.

name: Mykonos Theoxenia, a member of Design Hotels
description: The 4-star Mykonos Theoxenia offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mykonos. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, postal service are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, linens, slippers, towels, whirlpool bathtub. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Mykonos Theoxenia.priceline.com

name: Due Mari Mykonos
description: Situated in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, within less than 1 km of Agios Ioannis Beach and a 12-minute walk of Korfos, Due Mari Mykonos features accommodation with an infinity pool and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. Every room is equipped with a balcony with sea views. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a stovetop, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. The rooms have a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a kitchen with an oven. At Due Mari Mykonos each room comes with bed linen and towels. The wellness area at the accommodation is comprised of a wellness packages and a beauty services. Ornos is 1.1 km from Due Mari Mykonos, while Mykonos Windmills is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 5 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Arocaria
description: Located in Mýkonos City, 500 metres from Tourlos Beach, Arocaria Mykonos provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Arocaria Mykonos offers certain rooms with sea views, and every room is equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Arocaria Mykonos include Agia Anna Beach, Agios Stefanos Beach and Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: Kensho Ornos
description: Combining luxury with traditional Cycladic touches, Kensho Ornos boast elegantly designed units with state-of-the-art amenities within a 1-minute walk of Ornos Beach. Some feature their own private pool, while others are equipped with a private hot tub. Free WiFi is available throughout. Bright and airy, each air-conditioned room and suite boasts a bathroom with a spa bath, as well as free luxury Hermes bath amenities and is equipped with a hairdryer. Most of them open to a furnished terrace with magnificent sea, pool and mountain views. There is a seating area in every room, along with a flat-screen LED TV, a Nespresso machine and an iPad with unlimited access to music lists and the Kensho app which allows you to contact with all hotels departments instantly. The awarded gourmet restaurant of Kensho Boutique Hotel & Suites enjoys Ornos beach views and offers Greek and Mediterranean cuisine with fresh and local ingredients from all over Greece. Embrace in a laid-back atmosphere, sophisticated lounge experience at the famous Kensho bar where the experienced mixologists offer signature cocktails and refreshing drinks. Relaxing moments can be enjoyed at the property's hammam. The more active ones can use the on-site fitness centre. The spa has a make-up artist and a hairdresser, and offers beauty, face, body and nail treatments. The hotel also offers car hire services. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, featuring an array of premium boutiques and high-end restaurants, lies within 3 km of Kensho Ornos. The lively Psarou Beach is at 3 km. Mykonos Airport is 4 km way. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mykonos Riviera
description: The brand new 5 star Mykonos Riviera is set in Tourlos port and marina and features ultra chic nautical-themed style, panoramic sunset views and luxurious accommodation options. Unparalleled services and amenities including an exquisite Spa, 2 restaurants, and an infinity pool with fiber optic lighting are also provided. The hotel is amphitheatrically built across the marina, merely few minutes from Agios Stefanos beach, and a short stroll from the scenic Mykonos Town. The spacious rooms and suites of Mykonos Riviera include nautical aesthetics going hand in hand with their unique island chic style, minimalistic luxury and unobstructed Aegean sea views. Each room is fitted with open plan bathrooms, designer bathtubs, nautical-themed decoration, flat-screen TVs, Nespresso machines, ambiance lighting, and private terraces overlooking the Aegean sea and the port with its marina. Some rooms or suites also feature an outdoor hot tub or a private pool. A la carte breakfast is available each morning at the property. Mykonos Riviera also offers a car rental service and a business centre and shuttle service from/to the airport upon extra charge and request. Staff at reception can assist around the clock with information on the area.

name: Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, 1.4 km from Panormos Beach, Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms come with a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos. Agios Sostis Beach is 2.2 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from Nasta Suites & Villa Intentional Living Mykonos.

name: Anemelia Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in Mýkonos City, 1.1 km from Elia Beach, Anemelia Hotel Mykonos offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Elia Nudist Beach. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms include a coffee machine, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Anemelia Hotel Mykonos all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. Kalo Livadi Beach is 3 km from Anemelia Hotel Mykonos, while Mykonos Windmills is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Mileo
description: Set in Kalo Livadi, 300 metres from Kalo Livadi Beach, Mileo offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Mileo every room includes bed linen and towels. Loulos Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Agia Anna Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 7 km from Mileo.

name: Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas
description: Situated on Megali Ammos beach, the design hotel Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas is just 300m away from Mykonos town. It offers a pool with views of the sunset, the sea and the island’ trademark windmills. Each of the air-conditioned rooms is simply designed and equipped with satellite TV, hairdryer, fridge and balcony, while some of the rooms have balcony with sea view. Guests are greeted with a complimentary drink. A Mediterranean buffet breakfast prepared with fresh ingredients, such as local pies and cheese is served each morning. Guests at Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas can explore the tasty cuisine of the a la carte pool/sea side restaurant, as well as the pool lounge bar’s cocktails, while watching the sun setting in the Aegean Sea. The pool area is equipped with comfortable sun beds, serving as a great point for relaxation. There is also a free internet point and free wireless internet access in public areas. Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas is 1 km from the port and 2 km from the airport. The hotel’s shuttle bus provides complimentary transfer from the port/airport upon arrival and departure upon request.

name: Mykonos Blanc
description: Mykonos Blanc Hotel is a 5-star beachfront luxury boutique hotel in Mykonos, a proud member of the LVX Preferred Hotels and Resorts network. The non-color conformity of its interiors and exterior outdoor landscape acts as a soft touch to the soul, embossing the intense blue nature of the Aegean sea and the cosmopolitan lifestyle of Mykonian living, making Mykonos Blanc luxury boutique hotel, the perfect holiday canvas at the popular Ornos bay in Mykonos. Mykonos Blanc Hotel features 42 luxury seaside boutique styled rooms and suites. This dreamy luxury hotel has one and only destination, the everyday living at sea. Arched doorways and candle-lit living areas give this wonder-around feeling. Follow the path to a pool and garden wonderworld, a dreamy riviera landscape overlooking the blue waters of Ornos bay in Mykonos. Indulge in an in-room relaxing hot tubbing with a sea-view bliss, romancing or friend-mingling during evenings at their own en-suite lounging space. Yet, as an element of surprise, the secluded calm is interchanged by the upbeat Mykonian fun, a few steps further away on the coast of Ornos bay, on a choice of award winning resto’s and beach bars. Try out exotic gourmet pleasures at Kuzina Mykonos and Pasaji’s Asian Fusion cuisine and the trattoria Farina of Italian origin.

name: Nomia Sunset Suites Mykonos
description: Nomia Sunset Suites Mykonos has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and restaurant in Tagou. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Nomia Sunset Suites Mykonos features some units with city views, and each room is equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. A buffet, à la carte or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Tourlos Beach is 1.5 km from Nomia Sunset Suites Mykonos, while Agia Anna Beach is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the hotel.

name: Portes Suites & Villas Mykonos
description: Offering an outdoor pool in a lush Mykonian garden, Portes Mykonos is situated in Glastros, 1.5 km from Psarrou Beach, 2 km from Platys Gialos and 2 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos City. Free WiFi is provided throughout. Blending traditional white-washed architecture with modern touches, villas and suites at Portes Suites & Villas Mykonos feature a private pool or a hot tub. Each enjoys views of the lush garden from its balcony. Some feature a spa bath as well. Every suite and villa comprises a fully equipped kitchen and spacious living room. Sumptuous Greek traditional breakfast is offered exclusively to each suite and villa. Yoga classes can be organised while guests can also enjoy the services of a personal trainer. BBQ facilities are also available on site. Mykonos Airport is 1.5 km away. Surcharge airport and port shuttle services can be provided upon request during the summer season.

name: Belvedere Hotel
address: School Of Fine Arts District, Mykonos 846 00
description: This chic hotel in Mykonos’ Chora offers a magnificent swimming pool with sunset views, a 24-hour state-of-the-art gym, gourmet restaurant and airy rooms with beautiful sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Belvedere’s romantic rooms are unique, each with its own design elements, fabrics, furnishings and textured details. Bathrooms feature rain showers. I-pod docking stations, flat-screen TVs, DVDs and high fidelity surround systems are featured. The gym features a stretching area, cardio vascular equipment area, as well as a strength equipment area. Guests can enjoy a variety of invigorating and restorative treatments at Six Senses Mykonos upon request. Guest can enjoy fine dining at Matsuhisa Mykonos or the Belvedere Club. Live performances are organized during the summer season. Belvedere’s front-office team will be happy to assist guests with travel arrangements and restaurants reservations. Valet parking and concierge service is offered. Daily newspapers, magazines, books, as well as complimentary internet points are available.

name: Vencia Boutique Hotel
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Vencia Boutique Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Vencia Boutique Hotel. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, towels, separate living room, internet access wireless. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, diving, massage, horse riding, garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Vencia Boutique Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Ubud Mykonos
description: When you stay at Ubud Mykonos in Mykonos, you'll be on the beach, a 4-minute drive from Ornos Beach and 7 minutes from Windmills of Mykonos. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: O Lofos Luxury Boutique Suites
description: O Lofos Luxury Boutique Suites luxury boutique suites are located in Agios Stefanos, just 3 km from the cosmopolitan Mýkonos City. Free WiFi is provided. The accommodation comes with a seating and dining area. A refrigerator and stovetop are provided, while there is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher. There is a private bathroom with slippers and free toiletries in every unit. Bed linen is available. Most suites come with a non-heated, private pool. The sandy beach of Agios Stefanos lies within a short driving distance of the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from O Lofos Luxury Boutique Suites.

name: Acrogiali Beachfront Hotel Mykonos
description: Just steps from the beach of Platis Gialos, Hotel Acrogiali offers rooms with free WiFi. Free pick-up and drop-off service is offered and free parking is available. The town of Mykonos is a 10-minute bus ride. The Acrogiali Beachfront Hotel Mykonos offers spacious sea-view rooms, as well as rooms with garden view. Each room is air-conditioned and includes bathroom with rainfall shower and hairdryer, satellite TV, radio and refrigerator. A rich breakfast buffet is served at Acrogiali Beachfront Hotel Mykonos’s breakfast area. Two bars are also available. Guests also have access to the swimming pool of a neighbouring property, while free sunbeds are provided at the beach. Hired boats leave daily the Platis Gialos Beach to reach the beaches of Paraga, Paradise, Super Paradise, Agrari and Elia. Water sports facilities, as well as a diving centre are available.

name: Petasos Beach Resort And Spa
description: Petasos Beach stands on a private peninsula between Platis Yialos and Psarou Beach. It offers a 500 square-meter spa & wellness centre, a fitness centre and a 2-level swimming pool with waterfall. The Aqua Marine Spa offers revitalizing and thalasso-therapy treatments, as well as honeymoon packages. The luxuriously renovated Petasos Beach combines aesthetically perfect premises with breathtaking nature. Its innovatively designed rooms offer stunning views of the Aegean Sea. All accommodations are equipped with Wi-Fi internet access. Deluxe and superior rooms also feature a spa bath and steam cabin. There are 2 restaurants within the premises of the Resort, with a great view of the Aegean sea.

name: Vrachos Suites Mykonos
description: No description found

name: Elia Mykonos Resort
description: Located right on the sandy Elia Mykonos Resort of Mykonos, the Cycladic-style Elia Mykonos Resort features a beachfront restaurant, a boutique and a garden full of palm and olive trees. It offers free WiFi in all areas and tastefully decorated units with a balcony. Overlooking the Aegean Sea or the garden, the rooms and suites of Elia are fitted with tiled floors and beamed ceilings. Each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. Some of the suites also include a seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Each room includes free sunbeds and towels. Featuring a wellness center contains Spa, Gym, and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy drinks, coffee and Mediterranean dishes at the bar-restaurant offering sea views. Sunbeds and beach towels are offered. Elia Mykonos Resort lies within 10 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town and 9 km from Mykonos National Airport. Psarrou Beach with its famous beach bars and clubs is at 13 km. A pharmacy store, supermarket and ATM can be found at 3 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Akkadian Boutique Hotel
address: Vrisi Region, Mykonos Ring Road, Mykonos
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, less than 1 km from Megali Ammos Beach, Akkadian Boutique Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Rooms come with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and some have pool views. At Akkadian Boutique Hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Korfos Beach, Agios Charalabos Beach and Mykonos Windmills. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 2 km from Akkadian Boutique Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Villa Del Sol
description: Just a short walk from Ornos Beach, Villa Del Sol Mykonos Island boasts an outdoor pool surrounded by a stone-paved terrace furnished with comfortable sun loungers. It also offers free private parking on site and is a short car ride from Mykonos Windmills and Mykonos Old Port. The property offers a welcome drink to all guests on arrival. Complimentary wireless internet access is available. Villas at Villa Del Sol Mykonos Island include rain showers, slippers and flat-screen TVs, and some provide direct access to the pool. They are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a refrigerator and converters/voltage adaptors. Room service is available on request, and includes meals that are prepared at the property's off-site beach restaurant just 30 metres away. Villa Del Sol Mykonos Island has easy access to the Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. It also provides an ideal base to discover nearby Mykonos and Agios Ioannis.Revato

name: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos
description: Experience the mesmerizing magic of Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos. Our luxury beach resort is just 10 minutes from the airport and town, Santa Marina makes it easy to explore all the island’s must-see attractions – then return to our sanctuary of authentic Aegean beauty at Ornos Bay. Choose from 102 guest rooms and suites, along with 13 villas featuring two to seven bedrooms. Beach-chic interiors offer modern, natural luxury, opening to balconies with hypnotic Aegean views. Discover the only private sandy beach on Mykonos, gorgeous infinity pools, the international-caliber Ginkgo Spa and four options for dining and drinks, highlighted by the world’s first ever Buddha-Bar Beach. Our Santa Marina resort invites you to savour the glamorous lifestyle of Mykonos in the island’s most fashionable and sophisticated setting.Marriott

name: Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge
address: Megali Amos Beach, 500M From Mykonos Town, Mykonos 846 00
description: The 5-star Bill & Coo offers sea-view suites & villas, Mediterranean flavours and an infinity pool with views of the sea. Situated in Megali Ammos Beach of Mykonos, it is a proud member of Leading Hotels of the World. Bill & Coo’s luxury suites feature contemporary design and modern bathrooms with walk-in shower. Each is equipped with free WiFi, satellite LCD TV and working desk. Some rooms include an outdoor hot tub or pool. The coastal suites are located in Agios Ioannis, at the Bill & Coo Coast adults-only complex, 3 km from the main complex and 3.5 from Mykonos town. Bill & Coo brand-new Villas are located a few meters away from Megali Ammos beach and connected with Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge property through an internal path. The hotel's awarded fine dining restaurant, the Gastronomy Project, is situated by the pool and offers spectacular sea and sunset views. It serves a Mediterranean creative cuisine based on seasonal local products. Signature cocktails and refreshing drinks are proposed at the sunset lounge bar. Beauty and body treatments are available at the Spa by Valmont as well a gym in the spa area. The hotel offers a great array of personalised services including round-trip transfers to Mykonos Airport and port. Bill & Coo is conveniently located 10 minutes walking distance from Mykonos Town. It is 2.5 km from the Mykonos Airport and port.

name: Mykonos Ammos Hotel
description: Situated on the sandy and lively Ornos Beach, the 5-star boutique hotel of Mykonos Ammos provides trendy sun loungers and beach service. Member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, it features an outdoor pool, and a wellness and beauty centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Stylishly decorated with earth tones and white washed walls, the spacious rooms and suites are air conditioned. Each comes with a 37” flat-screen TV, DVD player, laptop safe, toiletries and hairdryer. They all open out to a terrace or balcony, while some offer sea views. Kuzina Restaurant provides fusion culinary dishes that combine Asian and Mediterranean flavours and can be enjoyed by the seaside. Farina Italian Restaurant serves genuine Italian cuisine in a stylish setting, while Mykonos Ammos Beach and Bar prepares signature cocktails throughout the day. Room service is also accessible. Guests are provided with complimentary beach towels and daily newspapers. The 24-hour front desk can arrange tours of Mykonos and concierge services upon request with surcharge. Mykonos Ammos Hotel is just 2.5 km from Mykonos Town, as well as Mykonos Airport and the port. Various restaurants, cafés and a supermarket are all within a short walking distance. Private parking can be found on site.

name: Hotel Madalena
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, 400 metres from Agia Anna Beach, Hotel Madalena features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 500 metres from Mykonos Old Port, 1 km from Little Venice and 1.2 km from Mykonos Windmills. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At Hotel Madalena the rooms have bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hotel Madalena include Tourlos Beach, Agios Charalabos Beach and Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: Ilio Maris
description: With magnificent views over the sea and the famous windmills of Mykonos Town, Ilio Maris boasts elegant guestrooms with Wi-Fi and 32’’ TV and quick access to the beaches by bus. Guests can take a dip at the Ilio Maris swimming pool and enjoy the lovely sunset view over the Aegean Sea. Cocktails are available at the pool bar and plenty of sun loungers and umbrellas are provided. The elegantly refurbished guest rooms at Ilio Maris have spacious balconies or terraces, most with sea views. At the 24-hour reception desk guests can always find tourist information and tickets for trips to Delos. Private cruises, car and bike rental, as well as transfer service can be arranged on request. Ilio Maris is located on the border of Mykonos Town, close to the taxi and bus terminals, allowing easy access to the cosmopolitan town, as well as to the beautiful sandy beaches Paradise, Paranga, Psarou and Platis Yialos. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Kouros Hotel & Suites
description: Located on the seafront of Mykonos town, just 300 metres from Mykonos Town, the Kouros Hotel & Suites offers elegant accommodation and a quiet location with views over the old and new harbours. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Each of the rooms at Kouros Hotel & Suites is large and luxuriously appointed while retaining the charm of the typical Cycladic architecture. All rooms have private terraces with Aegean Sea views. Mykonos Airport is 3 km away. Free private parking is available in the premises.

name: Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels Of The World
description: The 5-star Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels of the World boasts stunning views of the Aegean Sea and a private beach area. It includes spa facilities, gourmet cuisine, hot tub and 3 swimming pools. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All air-conditioned rooms of Myconian Imperial have modern décor and balconies with superb views of Elia Beach. They are equipped with an LCD satellite TV, DVD/CD player and safety box. Some feature outdoor hot tubs or private pools. A rich American breakfast is offered at Meltemi. Fine Mediterranean dishes are served at the Celebrities a la carte restaurant. Guests also have the choice of 2 cocktail bars and a beach bar. Mykonos Airport is around 10 km away from the resort. The picturesque town of Mykonos with whitewashed, Cycladic-style houses, bars and shops is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Queen Boutique Suites
description: No description found

name: Eden View Suites & Villas
description: Set just 200 metres from Paradise Beach, Eden View Suites & Villas features a two-building complex of self-catering units, each with a private, outdoor pool. Traditional, yet modern in style, each suite or maisonette at Eden View Suites & Villas opens to a spacious veranda with sea views. A 24 hour bus stop is 300 metres from the premises and can take you straight to the city centre. The cosmopolitan Mykonos City is 6 km away. Mykonos Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites
description: Located in Plintri, 2.1 km from Super Paradise Beach, Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers free shuttle service and room service. The hotel has a terrace and mountain views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available daily, and includes American, vegetarian and vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites. Mykonos Windmills is 5.1 km from the accommodation, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites.

name: Leonis Summer Houses
description: A 10-minute walk from Ornos beach, Leonis Summer Houses is 3 km from Mykonos town. It features an outdoor swimming pool with hydromassage facilities and sun beds. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout. Equipped with a furnished balcony with town and sea views, all the units offer a flat-screen satellite TV and air conditioning. They include a seating area and a kitchen with fridge and a Nespresso coffee maker. Some units are split level maisonettes, while all of them have an i Pod docking station. A continental breakfast consisting of fresh products is prepared daily and can be enjoyed in the privacy of your room upon request or at the on-site bar. A variety of refreshments and light snacks is also served. The tour desk can provide information on local attractions and excursions. Leonis Summer Houses is located 4 km from Mykonos Airport. Transfers to and from the airport are available upon request at an extra charge. Various restaurants, cafés-bars are located on Ornos beach.

name: Myconian Korali Relais & Chateaux
description: Standing gracefully over the island of Delos and the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town, Myconian Korali Relais & Chateaux offers 5-star accommodation within 1 km from the town centre. Rooms and suites at Myconian Korali have an ethnic chic character, underlined with colourful details, impeccable fabrics and handpicked art pieces. Some have their own private pool and most of them offer breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. At the heart of the Myconian Korali, lies the Relais et Châteaux Restaurant where the fine art of haute cuisine meets the carefully selected raw materials, produced locally and exclusively for Korali’s guests. At the elegant bar by the pool terrace you will enjoy early drinks strolling along the deck at sunset. Within 1 km, you can visit the famous Mykonos Windmills and Little Venice, while Mykonos Port is 3 km away. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Deliades Hotel
description: Overlooking Ornos Bay, Deliades Hotel features large rooms with free WiFi, a swimming pool with hydromassage and a poolside restaurant. The Cycladic complex is only 50 metres from the beach. All rooms and suites are air conditioned and come with a flat-screen, satellite TV and minibar. The tasteful units at Deliades are serviced twice daily by maid, while some feature balconies or terraces with views of the bay and the town. An American breakfast buffet, including both Greek and International specialities, is served each morning. A small choice of starters, salads and main courses are available for lunch, while the a la carte dinner emphasises in Greek and International cuisine. Arrangements for car hire, air and boat tickets as well as excursions can also be provided upon request. Deliades Hotel is located only a few kilometres from the town of Mykonos, and connected frequently by local bus. Water taxis connect Ornos beach to other beaches such as Psarou, Platis Gialos, Paradise, Super Paradise and to the island of Delos.

name: Apiro Mykonos
description: When you stay at Apiro Mykonos in Mykonos, you'll be near the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Windmills of Mykonos and Ornos Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Palladium Hotel
address: Platis Gialos Beach,PO Box 7100 Mykonos, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Palladium Hotel is located at Platys Gyalos, a 5-minute walk from Psarou and Platys Gyalos Beaches, as well as just a breath away from the famous Nammos. It is a 5-star hotel featuring free WiFi in all areas, an outdoor and an indoor heated swimming pool, a lavish spa and fashion boutique. A state-of-the art fitness centre and sauna are also available. Each of the elegant suites and rooms is air-conditioned and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and furnished private balconies. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine, hair dryer and ironing facilities. Korres toiletries can be found at the private bathroom. Some units also feature a private pool or hot tub. Guests are greeted with a welcome drink and wake up to a rich American breakfast buffet served daily. Guests in rooms with a private pool can also enjoy a floating breakfast in the privacy of their own pool. Services that can be enjoyed at the spa center include massages, hair, beauty and facial treatments, hammam and hot tub. La Veranda restaurant serves innovative Mediterranean cuisine created from fresh Greek products. Palladium’s lobby bar, overlooking the Aegean sea and the starlit swimming pool offers Signature cocktails. The poolside bar offers lounge-style sunbeds and refreshing drinks. Other options include a snack bar. In-room dining is also available upon request. The hotel’s 24-hour front desk can arrange baby-sitting and laundry service. Guest services include free two-way transfer to/from Mykonos Airport/Port, concierge service and doctor on call. Mykonos town and Mykonos airport are 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available. Guest services include free two-way transfer to/from Mykonos Airport/Port from 07:00 until 00:00.

name: Archipelagos Hotel
description: Located in Kalafati, Archipelagos Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, chapel, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, separate living room, internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, skiing, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Archipelagos Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Ostraco Suites
description: Located on a hilltop, the Ostraco Suites offers breathtaking views over the Aegean Sea. This luxury boutique hotel features a freeform pool with a sun terrace and a stylish cocktail bar. Mykonos Town is 600 metres away. The individually decorated Ostraco Suites reflect the distinctive Mykonos island aesthetics. Each is spacious with white-washed walls, stylish furniture and sunny terraces with stone-paved floors. Your day starts with a la Carte breakfast, served at the beautiful pool area, between 8:30 and 11:00, and prepared right in front of you. Throughout the day the bar serves cocktails and a variety of drinks. The hotel spa offers a variety of treatments. The attentive hotel staff is available 24-hours a day, offering car rental services and arranging boat and plane trips.

name: Anna Maria Mykonos Hotel
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with sun loungers, Anna-Maria Mykonos Hotel is located in Glastros area of Mykonos, within 1.5 km of the famous Psarrou Beach. It offers free WiFi throughout and free, on-site parking. The Cycladic-style rooms and studios are fitted with tiled floors, modern furnishings and soft colours. The modern bathroom comes with a shower or bath tub and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a breakfast served daily by the pool. A variety of restaurants and mini markets can be found 100 metres from the property. A bus stops just outside Anna-Maria Mykonos Hotel. The cosmopolitan Mykonos Town is 2 km away and Platys Gialos Beach is at a distance of 2 km. Car and bike rental services are available.

name: Mykonos Dove Beachfront Hotel
description: Mykonos Dove Beachfront Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Mykonos, whether exploring or just passing through. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, taxi service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as free welcome drink, slippers, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless. Take a break from a long day and make use of the watersports equipment rentals, outdoor pool, pool (kids). A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Mykonos Dove Beachfront Hotel.Agoda

name: Kamari Hotel
description: Kamari hotel is located just a few meters from the beach of Platys Gialos, on the south western side of Mykonos. The nearby Psarou Beach and Paradise Beach offer more options of sparking waters and sandy beaches. Recreational amenities at Kamari Hotel include an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a children's pool. Other amenities include complimentary breakfast, a bar/lounge, and a poolside bar. All Kamari Mykonos hotel rooms, are air-conditioned and include TVs. Rooms also include refrigerators and hair dryers and enjoy a balcony or a veranda with a sea, pool or garden view. Hotel Kamari provides an airport shuttle. The property has a 24-hour front desk. Onsite parking is complimentary. A frequent service bus stop is situated right in front of the hotel, ensuring easy access to the town.

name: Pelican Bay Hotel
description: Inspired by the beauty of the Cyclades’ landscape, Pelican Bay Hotel offers elegant accommodation with an outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is offered. All rooms are soundproofed and have a balcony or terrace with left side sea view. The fully air conditioned lobby lounge provides a satellite TV with five major languages’ cable channels. A laptop computer is available for guests to use. Pelican Bay Hotel offers stylish and artistic settings, excellent services, luxury rooms with taste and unique decoration. Shuttle services are provided upon charge. Pelican Bay is located in Platis Yialos, only 300 metres from the famous beach and public bus stop, 4 km away from the airport and the centre of the town of Mykonos and port.

name: Mykonos Town Suites
description: Offering self-catering accommodation, Mykonos Town Suites is located in the Mykonos City Centre district of Mýkonos City, 300 metres from Mykonos Windmills. Free WiFi is featured. Simply yet tastefully decorated, all studios and apartments are equipped with a kitchenette with mini oven and hobs or a fully equipped kitchen. Each features a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. A terrace with garden views is offered in every unit. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Little Venice is a 4-minute walk from Mykonos Town Suites. Mykonos Airport is 2 km away. Nammos Mykonos is 3.3 km away.

name: Portobello Boutique Hotel
description: Portobello Boutique Hotel is less than a 10-minute walk from the Old Port and boasts spectacular views over the Aegean Sea. It offers free WiFi access and a 65-inch smart TVs with satellite channels in one double Room & all suites and one 32-inch smart TVs with satellite channels in one double room category. All of the rooms and suites at the Portobello Boutique hotel are air conditioned and many have either a balcony or a furnished terrace. They are fitted with a safety box, mini bar and hairdryer. A villa with private pool and 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms is also included in the property. Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast in the breakfast room featuring a TV or in the privacy of their veranda overlooking the sea.

name: Ac Village Christoulis
description: Offering a pool, the traditionally built AC Village Christoulis are 2.5 km from Super Paradise Beach. They feature self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. The property is 1.8 km from Mykonos Old Port. Opening to a furnished balcony or terrace, all air-conditioned and tastefully decorated studios, apartments and holiday homes of Christoulis come with garden or pool views. Each has a flat-screen, satellite TV and an open-plan kitchen with dining table and oven with cooking hobs, while some include a living room with sofa. Ironing facilities are featured. Guests may relax at the sun terrace by the pool. BBQ facilities and a garden with plants are provided. A restaurant and a café bar can be found within a short drive. The popular Mykonos Windmills and Little Venice are 2 km away. Mykonos Airport is located 1 km from the property and free shuttle service is offered. Paraga Beach is 3.5 km away and Ornos Beach is 4.5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Rocabella Mykonos Hotel
description: Rocabella Mykonos Hotel is located within walking distance of the sandy Agios Stefanos beach. It boasts a pool, fine dining, stylish rooms and a spa. The rooms of Rocabella feature free Internet access and a furnished sea-view balcony or terrace. They are fitted with a satellite LCD TV and a safe. Some rooms also include an outdoor plunge pool. A pillow menu is also available. The state-of-the-art spa is equipped with a sauna and a gym. It also provides facial and beauty treatments, and massages. Greek breakfast is served daily in the dining area. The hotel’s restaurant prepares gourmet cuisine in a romantic poolside setting. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar with views over the neighbouring Tinos and Dilos islands. Personalised concierge services are available for guests, as well as a turn-down service with essential oils. Mykonos Airport is 5 km away from Rocabella. The picturesque town of Mykonos is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Sea View Residence
description: Just 1.5 km from the famous beaches of Ornos and Agios Ioannis, the traditionally built Sea View Apartments features a pool and hot tub. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi and furnished balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea. An LCD TV and fridge are included in all the air-conditioned units at the Sea View Apartments. Some accommodation types feature a kitchenette or kitchen with cooking facilities and a dining area. Mykonos International Airport is 4 km away, while the scenic town of Mykonos is at 4.5 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Tagoo Black Mykonos
description: The Cycladic-style Tagoo Black Mykonos is set above the old Mykonos Port, 600 metres from Tourlos Beach. There is a swimming pool with poolside bar with a shaded area overlooking the sea ideal for breakfast or evening sunsets. Featuring minimalist style and soothing colours, all rooms at Tagoo Black Mykonos have a sea view, a private balcony and private pool overlooking the Aegean Sea. Each includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and fridge. Agios Stefanos Beach is just 2 km away. The centre of Mykonos Town is within a 10-minute walk. Staff can arrange car, motorcycle and mini boat rentals, while shuttle service is provided upon request at surcharge.

name: Flaskos Suites
description: Flaskos Suites and more are located only a few steps from the sandy beach of Agios Stefanos. They offer great views of Delos, Syros and Tinos. Free internet is provided. A sea-water pool is available for use. The Cycladic style complex comprises of suites, rooms, as well as studios and apartments with air conditioning. Some have a balcony with an outdoor dining area and some also have a view of the sea. Homemade delicacies and drinks are served at the poolside snack-bar. The complex also features a mini market. At just 20 metres from the property, visitors can find Greek traditional taverns. Mykonos City is 2.5 km away.

name: Lithos by Spyros & Flora
description: Located 100 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, the brand-new Lithos by Spyros & Flora is a whitewashed complex offering modernly designed accommodation with a furnished balcony. It includes a swimming pool overlooking the Aegean Sea, a lobby and a pool bar. Studios and apartments at Lithos are minimally furnished and decorated in soft tones. They all include a kitchenette and a living area with a satellite LCD TV. The spacious bathroom is stocked with free toiletries, hairdryer and slippers. Some units enjoy views over the pool and Agios Ioannis Bay. Guests can enjoy refreshing drinks, fresh juices and snacks at a shaded area by the pool or have an evening cocktail at the lobby bar. Continental breakfast is served in the morning. The picturesque and lively centre of Mykonos Town is 4 km away and Mykonos Airport is at 4.5 km. The sandy beach of Ornos can be reached within 2 km. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout and free on-site parking is possible.

name: Adorno Beach Hotel and Suites
description: Situated in Ornos, Adorno Beach Hotel and Suites features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property offers an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms include a wardrobe and a private bathroom. With traditional whitewashed walls, wooden pergolas and pastel-coloured shutters, the property combines the Cycladic style with infusions of chic Bohemian décor. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Adorno Beach Hotel and Suites will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ornos, like cycling. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 3 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Myconian Ambassador Hotel Relais & Chateaux
address: Platis Gialos, P.O. Box 64, Mykonos, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Overlooking the popular beach of Platis Gialos, the Myconian Ambassador Relais & Chateaux provides excellent spa and wellness facilities, and a huge outdoor swimming area. The stylish rooms at the Myconian Ambassador Relais & Chateaux have Aegean-Sea views. Facilities include a satellite LCD TV, CD/DVD player and minibar. Some units also feature an outdoor hot tub, or a private or sharing pool. At the spa centre, guests can pamper themselves with Pantai treatments and body massages. It also offers an indoor pool, a hot tub and Elemis products. Guests can start their day with a rich breakfast at Latitudes, while light meals and drinks are served by the pool from George’s Bar. As the sun sets, you can enjoy your evening cocktail, or have a candle-lit dinner at Efisia Restaurant. The hotel offers free shuttle service to/from the Port and to/from Mykonos Airport located 2.5 km away. The scenic main town of Mykonos is within a 10-minute drive. Guests can also join the resort’s diving club.

name: Villa Elina suites and more
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include designer toiletries, laundry facilities, towels, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Petinos Beach Hotel
address: Platis Gialos Beach 116, Platys Gialos, Greece, Platis Gialos
description: The Cycladic-style Petinos Beach is 200 metres from Mykonos’ Platis Gialos beach. It offers an open-air lounge, outdoor swimming pool with bar, and guest rooms with balconies overlooking the Aegean Sea. Each guestroom at Petinos Beach Hotel comes with bright décor, wooden ceilings and antique-style furnishings. Some rooms also offer work desks. The pool side restaurant Thea serves Mediterranean dishes, fresh fish and snacks throughout the day. At the a la carte restaurant Blue Myth guests can enjoy romantic candlelit dinners with spectacular views of the bay. The front desk is at the guests’ disposal 24/7, offering tourist information, laundry and ironing service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

name: Hotel Jason
description: Hotel Jason Hotel is situated in Glastros area, 1.8 km from the city of Mykonos and 1.2 km from the beaches Psarou and Platis Gialos. The rooms at Jason Hotel are spacious and offer a fridge and a TV. Each also has a private bathroom with shower and a balcony. Some accommodation types offer self catering facilities such as a kitchenette. Jason Hotel features a swimming pool and free public Wi-Fi. Staff can arrange car and scooter rental. The Cycladic-style complex offers a peaceful atmosphere far from the bustle and hustle of Mykonos town, yet within easy reach. Free on-site parking is provided and paid transfer from the airport and port can be arranged upon request.

name: Mykonos Beach Hotel
description: Situated on Megali Ammos Beach, this Cycladic-style complex is a 15-minute drive from Mykonos Airport and Port. The air-conditioned rooms have balconies overlooking the Aegean Sea. Free Wi-Fi and a buffet breakfast are offered. All rooms at hotel Mykonos Beach are simply decorated and include a satellite TV and a fridge. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast served daily at the dining room. Within a 10-minute walk, they can reach the centre of Mykonos Town offering many dining and entertainment options. Situated close to the bus station, the hotel offers easy access to beaches. Staff at the 24-hour desk can offer information about the island and arrange car rentals. The Mykonos Beach offers pick up service from the airport and port upon charge.

name: New Aeolos Hotel
description: At a distance of 800 metres from Mykonos City Centre, Aeolos Hotel offers a large pool with hydromassage facilities and elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Free airport/port transfer is also provided from 7:00 to 23:00. The spacious and airy rooms are furnished with modern décor, while their balconies overlook the gardens or the pool. All rooms and suites are air conditioned and include flat-screen, satellite TV, mini fridge, hairdryer and safe. Guests enjoy a varied breakfast buffet including homemade delicacies. Facilities include a bar and an a la carte restaurant, while refreshing cocktails can be served by the poolside. Aeolos Hotel is just opposite the bus stop and within easy reach from the vibrant Mykonos Town centre. The friendly staff will happily assist guests with recommendations on places to visit, and maps and information about the island. A good selection of restaurants is available in the surrounding area. Private parking at the hotel is free.

name: Agia Anna Beachfront Boutique
description: No description found

name: Colours of Mykonos
description: Located 800 metres from Psarou, the Colours of Mykonos Luxury Residences & Suites offers an outdoor pool. It offers self-catering accommodation with stylish décor and free WiFi. The suites and residences will provide you with air conditioning and a seating area. There is a kitchenette with a refrigerator and kitchenware. Featuring a shower, the bathroom also comes with bathrobes and free toiletries. Some units are fitted with a hot tub. At Colours of Mykonos Luxury Residences & Suites you will find a garden and a sun terrace. Complimentary beach and pool towels are offered. Free, private on-site parking is provided. Ornos Beach is 2 km from the property. Mykonos Airport is a 10-minute drive away. Free arrival and departure transfer is provided.

name: Omnia Mykonos Boutique Hotel & Suites
description: Omnia Mykonos Boutique Hotel & Suites has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Ornos. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, free shuttle service and room service, along with free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature city views. At the hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak German, Greek, English and Spanish. Popular points of interest near Omnia Mykonos Boutique Hotel & Suites include Korfos, Ornos and Agios Ioannis Beach. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Mr & Mrs White Mykonos
description: The 4-star Mr & Mrs White Mykonos is situated on a privileged location at the island of Mykonos providing its guests a holistic, magnificent view to the bay of Platy Gialos. There is an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi to all the common usage places. The rooms comply with the charm of the traditional Myconian Architecture reflecting a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. All rooms are fully equipped with a hair-blower, mini bar, air condition, plasma TV and beauty-care goods. At the café-bar-restaurant of the hotel, you can indulge yourselves into a great variety of snacks and refined dishes combined with special cocktails.The hotel's staff is at your disposal on a 24-hour basis to assist you.

name: Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos
description: Located in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 300 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Kapari Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Korfos is a 16-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos.

name: Semeli Hotel
description: The sophisticated Hotel Semeli is situated in Mykonos town, 500m from Megali Ammos beach. It boasts tastefully decorated accommodation with sea, town or garden views, a sweet-water, heated pool with sun beds and a spa. All rooms or suites at Semeli Hotel Mykonos have a flat screen TV, seating area, marble bathroom and French doors with sea views. Whitewashed walls and a garden with geraniums and bougainvilleas provide the rooms’ exterior setting. Some units have an indoor or an outdoor hot tub. The a la carte restaurant Thioni serves a rich buffet breakfast by the pool. Greek and Italian cuisine is served throughout the day indoors or on the veranda overlooking the sea or the garden. Guests can enjoy cocktails at the hotel's pool bar. Guests can make use of the Semeli Hotel Mykonos gym facilities or relax with a Turkish hammam, or a massage session at the Semeli Spa. A variety of facial and body treatments are available. Within walking distance, guests can reach the centre of Mykonos town where many bars, cafes and restaurants can be found. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel and free private on-site parking is possible.

name: Branco Mykonos
description: The 5-star Branco Mykonos offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mykonos. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, wheelchair accessible are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, clothes rack, free welcome drink, linens. Access to the hotel's fitness center, outdoor pool, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Branco Mykonos.priceline.com

name: A Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a quiet countryside area only 15 minutes' walk from Mykonos Town, The A Hotel by Mykonos Arhontiko offers charming accommodation with a swimming pool and hot tub. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and free shuttle service. The tastefully decorated rooms and apartments at the A Hotel come each with a furnished patio overlooking the pool. They are built in traditional Cycladic style, and their facilities include air conditioning, satellite LCD TV and a fridge. A rich breakfast comes with the room served in the restaurant, where lunch and dinner is available for the rest of the day. If you wish, you can just spend a day at the Arhontiko with all amenities available. The swimming pool follows eco-friendly standards for water purification. Next to the pool, you will find the hot tub, as well as wooden deck chairs with mattresses, umbrellas and a pool bar. Staff are readily available for your car/bike rentals, island tours, as well as restaurant reservations, massage appointments and more. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Myconian Kyma - Design Hotels
description: Set on top of the famous Mykonian hill, Myconian Kyma - Design Hotels, all dressed up in the original Myconian white color, offers 5-star accommodation featuring a state-of-the-art spa centre. Rooms and suites at Kyma follow the straight lines and curves of the Cycladic architecture. Some of them have their own private pool overlooking the sea, and they all come with a satellite TV, minibar, slippers and free toiletries. At the on-site restaurant, you will taste authentic Mediterranean flavours, and at the hip bar by the main pool you can enjoy your cocktail while taking in the panoramic views over the island. Within 1 km you can visit the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town with its famous windmills and lively nightlife. Mykonos Port is 3 km away. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Paradise View Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from Paradise Beach and overlooking the Aegean Sea, Paradise View Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and offers free private parking and complimentary buffet breakfast. Paradise View offers a professional service with a personal touch. Built in the traditional style of the island, this hotel is situated at Paradise Beach. Guests can enjoy relaxing on the lovely terrace surrounding the outdoor pool. The location of the hotel provides beautiful views of the beach and the landscape. Paradise Beach offers a large variety of beach bars, shops, snack bars, restaurants and Greek tavernas. The airport is just a 10-minute drive away and the centre of Mykonos is only 15 minutes away. It can be accessed using the local bus, which stops in front of the hotel. There is also free Wi-Fi access at the hotel.

name: Grace Mykonos
description: Situated in Agios Stefanos, 100 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Grace Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast sea views. At Grace Mykonos rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Grace Mykonos include Choulakas Beach, Tourlos Beach and Mykonos New Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Amperian Mykonos Suites & Villas
description: Featuring a garden, an outdoor pool and sea views, Amperian Mykonos Suites & Villas is situated in Mýkonos City. These suites are equipped with 1 or 2 bedrooms, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven. A flat-screen TV is featured. Some units are fitted with a private pool or a hot tub. Nammos Mykonos is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Mykonos Windmills is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from Amperian Mykonos Suites & Villas. Located 500 meters away from the nearest beach.

name: Mykonos Princess Hotel
description: Mykonos Princess is located within walking distance of the sandy Beach of Agios Stefanos. It features a magnificent sea view pool, modern rooms with luxury amenities, and a Greek contemporary restaurant. The rooms of Mykonos Princess all feature free internet access and they each include a satellite LCD TV, a minibar and a safe. Most of the rooms have a furnished sea-view balcony or terrace. The wellness center features a gym. Discover the path to a healthier lifestyle with a variety of wellness services available at Mykonos Princess Wellness Center. Indulge in complete serenity and privacy with a revitalizing massage and experience a unique sense of relaxation. Re-energize mind, body and soul with a wide selection of fitness services and programs that can be customized to address your specific exercise goals. Al a carte breakfast is served daily in the dining and pool area. The hotel’s restaurant serves modern Greek cuisine in a romantic poolside setting. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar with views of Mykonos Town and Delos island Mykonos Airport is 4.8 km from Mykonos Princess. The picturesque town of Mykonos is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Alissachni Mykonos
description: Situated in Psarou, 2.9 km from Psarou Beach, Alissachni Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Alissachni Mykonos rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Alissachni Mykonos. Platis Gialos Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Alissachni Mykonos.

name: Dionysos Luxury Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Dionysos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dionysos Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hiking trails, hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, diving. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dionysos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Myconian Crown Suites
description: Providing free WiFi, a sun terrace with a swimming pool, garden and bar, Myconian Crown Suites is located in Kalafatis. A hot tub and a car rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. The rooms at Myconian Crown Suites include air conditioning and a desk. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Mýkonos City is 10 km from Myconian Crown Suites. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 12 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Peristeronas Village
description: Peristeronas Village is a self-catering accommodation located in Mykonos. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 1.8 km from Mykonos Old Port and Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. Shops and cafes are within 300 metres while a supermarket is 10 metres away. The apartment will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a patio. Private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower. You can enjoy mountain view and garden view from the room. At Peristeronas Village you will find an airport shuttle, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities like an ironing service and laundry facilities are offered. A bus stop offering connection with various beaches and Mykonos Town is round the corner. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Little Venice (2.2 km) and Mykonos Windmills (2.3 km). Mykonos Airport is located 2 km from the property. A bus to the beaches of Panormos, Elia, Kalo Livadi and Kalafatis stops right outside the property. Mykonos Town is 1.5 km away.

name: Mykonos4Islands Seaside Apartments
description: Located 300 metres from Kalo Livadi Beach, Mykonos4Islands Seaside Apartments offers a garden, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Each unit has a patio, a kitchen with a fridge, a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and a hairdryer. A stovetop and toaster are also provided, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Mykonos4Islands Seaside Apartments. Loulos Beach is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Agia Anna Beach is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 8 km from Mykonos4Islands Seaside Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mykonos Moussa
description: No description found

name: Kosmoplaz Beach Hotel
address: Platis Gialos, P.O. Box 346, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Stop at Kosmoplaz Hotel to discover the wonders of Mykonos. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kosmoplaz Hotel. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, separate living room, internet access wireless, private pool. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort makes Kosmoplaz Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Mykonos.priceline.com

name: Nimbus Mykonos
description: No description found

name: Manu Mykonos Next to the Beach Quality Brand Villa & Bungalows
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, 300 metres from Agia Anna Beach, Manu Mykonos Next to the Beach Quality Brand Villa & Bungalows features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and barbecue facilities. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms also feature a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a toaster. At Manu Mykonos Next to the Beach Quality Brand Villa & Bungalows each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mýkonos City, like cycling. Kalafatis Beach is 800 metres from Manu Mykonos Next to the Beach Quality Brand Villa & Bungalows, while Loulos Beach is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Obsession Mykonos
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a pool waterfall and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and free WiFi. Other amenities include designer toiletries, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Maki's Place
address: Tourlos Mykonos Tourlos Mykonos Mykonos Island 846 00, Tourlos 846 00
description: Overlooking the new port of Mykonos and located just 5 minutes from Agios Stefanos Beach, Makis Place features a bar-restaurant and a swimming pool with sun terrace. The Cycladic-style guest house offers free Wi-Fi in its public areas. Set amidst a lush garden, the air-conditioned units of Makis have beamed ceilings and are decorated with wooden furnishings. Each comes with a TV and a private bathroom with shower. Some units enjoy views over the Aegean Sea. A continental breakfast is served daily at the outdoor breakfast area, while guests can also enjoy Mediterranean flavours and refreshing cocktails at the elegant bar-restaurant. Makis Place is situated 2 km from the cosmopolitan capital of Mykonos and 4.5 km from Mykonos Airport. Troulos Beach is 200 metres from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Bellissimo Resort
description: Located in Agio Ioannis, Bellissimo Resort Mykonos is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Bellissimo Resort Mykonos. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, balcony/terrace, telephone can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include outdoor pool. Bellissimo Resort Mykonos is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: The Majestic Hotel
description: Situated over the dramatic Santorini cliffs, The Majestic Hotel features soundproofed rooms with private balcony enjoying views of the Aegean Sea or the volcano. It lies within 400 metres from Fira centre and just a few metres from the Caldera. The Majestic Hotel offers various accommodation types all with marble bathrooms with spa bath and verandas offering astounding views. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi internet. Hotel facilities include 3 fresh water swimming pools from which one is heated. A 24-hour front desk is available. At the Beauty Hall, guests may choose among several facial and body treatments, massage, Turkish bath, sauna or aromatherapy. The Capparis a-la carte restaurant serves rich breakfast every morning. The Crocus Restaurant offers an interesting wine list along with gourmet dishes prepared with seasonal products from the company’s organic farm.

name: Santorini Kastelli Resort
description: Stop at Santorini Kastelli Resort to discover the wonders of Santorini. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking, car park are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Santorini Kastelli Resort.priceline.com

name: Pantelia Suites
description: Pantelia Suites rest in a traditional family house, completely reconstructed into luxury accommodation. Located in the capital of the island, Fira, on the Caldera cliff side, you will enjoy superb views of the volcano and famous Santorini sunsets. Pantelia Suites are constructed with respect to the traditional architecture of the island.

name: Cliff Side Suites
description: Renovated and refurbished, Cliff Side Suites, overlooking the most famous sunset by the Aegean Sea, offer 4 star facilities only 500 metres from the centre of Fira town. Blending traditional local architecture with modern comforts, the residence offers sea-view rooms and suites featuring stone-built beds and sofas coupled with air condition and internet access. The swimming pool enjoys views of the caldera. Guests are treated with wireless internet access and 24 hour reception service. Upon request, the Cliff Side Suites can arrange transfers to and from the airport and port.

name: Abyssanto Suites & Spa
description: Set in Imerovigli and with Archaeological Museum of Thera reachable within 1.9 km, Abyssanto Suites and Spa offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides room service, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. Every room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At Abyssanto Suites and Spa you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Seafood and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Santorini Port is 12 km from Abyssanto Suites and Spa, while Ancient Thera is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 8 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Kalisti Hotel & Suites
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Fira Town, just metres from the Caldera, the Cycladic-style Kalisti Hotel & Suites features modern facilities with deluxe services. Set amidst a 2,500m² garden, the modern hotel offers a pool with a sun-lounger terrace and an outdoor hot tub. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Kalisti offer views of the sea, garden or pool and come with free WiFi and satellite TV. The bathrooms are fitted with forged cement and are stocked with a hairdryer, slippers and luxurious toiletries. A minibar comes standard. Greek & Santorinian Breakfast with free espresso can be enjoyed daily until 11:00 a.m. Pergola pool bar serves snacks, refreshing juices, drinks and cocktails throughout the day. The lively centre of Fira Town, where bars, clubs and shops are featured, is round the corner. Kalisti Luxury Hotel & Suites is 5 km from Santorini Airport and 6 km Athinios Port. The hotel is served by taxis and buses, which stop only 200 metres away.

name: Sagma Central
address: Eparchiaki Odos Firon-Ormou Perissis Perissa, Thera 847 03
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor pool, Sagma Central Rooms in Perissa provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with pool views. A continental breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. A car rental service is available at Sagma Central Rooms. Perissa Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Perivolos Beach is a 12-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 12 km from Sagma Central Rooms, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Desiterra Resort
description: Located 2.4 km from the cente of Fira, in Exo Gialos, Desiterra is a 5-star complex of elegantly decorated houses, each with a private pool and a terrace with sun loungers. Free WiFi and free on-site parking are available.
