Overlooking the Aegean Sea and the surrounding area, the houses and villas are uniquely decorated and come with a well-equipped kitchen, a dining area and a living room. Each unit has a private bathroom with built-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. Facilities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a toaster, a refrigerator and a coffee machine. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 3 km from Desiterra. The nearest airport is Thira Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Ethos Vegan Suites
description: Located in Fira, 2.8 km from Exo Gialos Beach, Ethos Vegan Suites features a garden and views of the city. Popular points of interest nearby include Orthodox Metropolitan Cathedral, Megaro Gyzi and Santorini Cable Car. This pet-friendly hotel also has free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a hot tub. Ethos Vegan Suites provides certain rooms with garden views, and all rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A vegan breakfast is available daily at Ethos Vegan Suites. The hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Ethos Vegan Suites include Archaeological Museum of Thera, Museum of Prehistoric Thera and Central Bus Station. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Museum Project Oia
description: No description found

name: Alizea Villas & Suites
description: Featuring a pool, the Cycladic-style Villa Alizea is just 650 metres from the centre of Fira in Santorini. Free WiFi is provided in all areas. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Alizea Villa has a flat-screen TV and a fridge. All rooms include a private, furnished balcony while some feature Aegean Sea views. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool or in the garden. Staff at the reception desk can arrange car, scooter and atv rentals, cruises and private tours. It also offers information on restaurants and bars. Consisting of 3 separate buildings, the Alizea is located 15 km from the famous Black Beach of Kamari. Santorini Airport is 9 km away and Athinios Port lies within 12 km.

name: Andronis Concept Wellness Resort
description: Situated on a hillside position with stunning views over the Mediterranean Sea, Andronis Concept Wellness Resort is peacefully set in Imerovigli. Facing the endless view on the Aegean sunset and the volcano, all minimal suites at Andronis Concept Wellness Resort all luxurious and minimal feature bright and comfortable interiors. Each features its own private swimming pool overlooking the azure Aegean Sea. All suites boast a living room with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each includes a private bathroom. A variety of Spa treatments, yoga classes and personal training services can be enjoyed. Guests may also taste local recipes at the on site restaurant. Fira, the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini, is 11 km away. Santorini (Thira) Airport is 6 km away.

name: Andronis Arcadia Hotel
description: Set within 6 km of Cape Columbo Beach and 300 metres of Naval Museum of Oia, Andronis Arcadia Hotel in Oia provides a terrace and rooms with free WiFi. The resort is also 3.2 km away from Saint Nicholas’ Church. The resort has an outdoor swimming pool and sea views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. The rooms in the resort are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 17 km from Andronis Arcadia Hotel.

name: Aressana Spa Hotel and Suites
description: Centrally located in Fira and only steps from the famous Caldera, this family-run hotel provides a peaceful base for its guests, with spa facilities and an outdoor pool area. Αressana Spa Hotel & Suites is a member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Guests can indulge in beauty and relaxation treatments at the hotel’s Tefsion Kallos Spa. There is also a well-appointed fitness centre on the site. Aressana Spa Hotel has many little hideaways where guests can read or just relax. A certified Greek Breakfast buffet with Santorinian specialties and traditional delicacies is served adjacent to the swimming pool between 08:00 and 11:00. The poolside snack bar provides a refreshing break from the Greek sun, serving light Santorinian and International meals, cool drinks and cocktails. Aressana Hotel’s peaceful location offers magnificent sunrise views. Santorini's many local taverns, shops and restaurants are just steps away from the hotel. The hotel is well-serviced by taxi and a bus station, located just 100 metres away. There is also a bank and post office close by. Santorini Airport (JTR) is 6 km away and Athinios Port is 10 km.

name: Santorini View
description: Located in Akrotiri, 800 metres from Caldera Beach, Santorini View provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. The property is around 1.8 km from Akrotiri Beach, 2.6 km from Almyra Beach and 1.9 km from Archaeological Site of Akrotiri. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Santorini View each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Santorini Port is 8 km from Santorini View, while Archaeological Museum of Thera is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Aroma Suites
description: With stunning views to the volcanic island of Nea Kameni and the Aegean Sea, this little hotel is located in the centre of Fira, 100 metres from the Cathedral Church. Built in the charming style of Cycladic architecture, Aroma Suites provides a serene, quiet haven for relaxation on the magnificent island of Santorini. Each apartment or room has its own small terrace or yard from which one can see the volcano, the deep blue waters of the Aegean Sea and the magnificent sunsets Santorini is so famous for. With gentle lighting and vibrant joyful colours, rooms are clean and simply decorated to themes of herbs or spices such as Lemongrass and Spearmint. All rooms have air conditioning and balconies with wonderful views. Free Wi-Fi is also provided throughout Aroma Suites.

name: La Bellezza Eco Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Kamari, La Bellezza Eco Boutique Hotel features air-conditioned rooms and free private parking. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. La Bellezza Eco Boutique Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a shared lounge at the property. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for horse riding and diving. Kamari Beach is 400 metres from La Bellezza Eco Boutique Hotel. Santorini (Thira) Airport is 3 km away.

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini
description: The 5-star Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini is set on the beachfront in Agia Paraskeyi, 5 km from Archaeological Museum of Thera. The property features a private beach area, as well as a fitness centre and views over the Aegean Sea. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides an outdoor pool as well as a hot tub. All stylishly outlined guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast sea views. Guest rooms at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. There is an in-house restaurant, which specialises in sophisticated cuisine and also offers vegetarian options. Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini offers a sauna, as well as relaxation and fitness experiences at Nikki Spa and Tone Gym. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 5 km from Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini, while Central Bus Station is 5 km from the property. Santorini International Airport is 1 km away.

name: Aria Lito Mansion
description: Centrally located in Santorini's capital, Fira Town, this beautiful hotel offers travellers stylish accommodation in a peaceful setting. Aria Lito Mansion is built in the wonderful style of Cycladic mansions. Beautifully restored, the mansion preserves its classical decoration, combined with all modern amenities. Resting at Aria Lito's quiet terraces, by the swimming pool or cozy garden, guests can witness the beauty of Fira town. On the east wing of the hotel, Santorini can be admired as it slopes down to the Aegean Sea. Guests may enjoy their breakfast in their high ceiling rooms and suites, decorated with taste and simplicity in accordance to the special character of this Mansion. The stylish rooms contain modern comforts. The location has a sense of refined luxury with a peaceful atmosphere, even though the hotel is close to the lively centre of Fira, with the most renowned restaurants. Guests may enjoy leisurely walks around the old quarter of Fira or take boat excursions to the volcano island of Nea Kameni and the hot springs of Palia Kameni around Thirassia.

name: San Giorgio
address: San Giorgio Villas, Main Street, Firá, Thera
description: No description found

name: Gianna Suites
description: No description found

name: El Greco Resort
description: Offering an adults-only spa centre, El Greco is conveniently located minutes from the centre of Fira. It boasts 5 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a children’s pool and 2 open-air tubs with hydromassage facilities. Conference facilities are also available. Each air-conditioned room reflects the traditional Cycladic style and features a mini fridge, satellite TV and balcony or terrace. Guests can start their day with an American buffet breakfast, while Greek and local dishes can be enjoyed for lunch or dinner at La Pergola restaurant. Coffee, refreshing beverages and cocktails are served at the poolside bar. The 24-hour reception can arrange excursions and boat trips, car rentals and currency exchange services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Santorini's beautiful sandy beaches are within easy reach from the hotel, Monolithos at 7 km, Kamari at 12 km and Perissa at 14 km away.

name: Enigma Suites
description: Overlooking the volcano, this chic hotel in Santorini offers sea-view rooms with private balconies. It boasts a spacious panoramic terrace with a café and bar. The brightly decorated interiors of Enigma Suites feature arched ceilings and elegant furniture. Each suite and apartment is air conditioned and has satellite TV. Some include kitchenettes and all of them include stylish bathrooms. Continental breakfast is served in the rooms or at Enigma cafe. Guests can relax with a massage or visit a health centre 300 metres from the property. Santorini Airport is 6 km from Enigma Suites. The multilingual staff can arrange airport transfers, taxis or a car rental. Santorini Port can be found 13 km away.

name: Delion View Hotel
description: Well set in Fira, DELION VIEW HOTEL provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to an indoor pool. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. DELION VIEW HOTEL features certain rooms that include a balcony, and every room comes with a kettle. The units feature a wardrobe. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near DELION VIEW HOTEL include Archaeological Museum of Thera, Megaro Gyzi and Museum of Prehistoric Thera. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 6 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aegean Gem
address: Eparchiaki Odos Mesarias - Archeas Thira, Thera 847 00
description: Located in Kamari and with Kamari Beach reachable within 500 metres, Aegean Gem provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub and room service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Aegean Gem offers certain rooms with mountain views, and all rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Aegean Gem offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Ancient Thera is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Archaeological Museum of Thera is 8.1 km away. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 3 km from Aegean Gem, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aghios Artemios Traditional Houses
address: 1.5 km Vourvoulos - Oia Rd, Imerovigli, Thera 847 00
description: Located on the east coast of Santorini, Cycladic-style Aghios Artemios Traditional Houses is 100 metres above the sea. Set in a 15th-century building complex, it offers whitewashed, cave-style rooms around a scenic churchyard. A pool provides panoramic views over the Aegean Sea. Rooms are individually decorated with blue and white colours, built-in beds and traditional furnishings. Each includes a satellite TV and fridge. All units have views to the churchyard or the Aegean Sea and some feature a terrace. Breakfast is served in the spacious dining room of the Traditional Houses Aghios Artemios or in the sun terrace with views of the sea. Guests have access to a tennis court and a well-equipped fitness centre while relaxing massages are also provided. Free Wi-Fi access is available in public areas. Within a 10-minute drive from Aghios Artemios guests can find the quiet beaches of Pori, Kolumbo and Baxedes. The capital town of Fira is 4 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Anessis
description: Built in accordance to local architecture, Anessis is centrally located in Fira capital and features a swimming pool and a hot tub surrounded by a furnished sun terrace. It offers air-conditioned units with free Wi-Fi and balconies overlooking the Aegean Sea. Fitted with wrought-iron beds and soft colours, the rooms and studios of Anessis are equipped with a fridge, a safe and a TV. Each unit features a private bathroom with bath tub or shower. Guests will find a variety of restaurants, bars and shops within within walking distance of the property. Santorini Airport is 5 km away, while Ormos Athinios Port is 8 km away. Staff at the front desk can provide car rental services and can also arrange excursions and cruises around the island and volcano.

name: Eternity Suites Santorini
description: No description found

name: Meli Meli
description: Meli Meli is located in the surroundings of Imerovigli Village, just a 10-minute drive from Fira Town. It features a swimming pool with sun loungers and a terrace. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Built according to the typical Cycladic architecture, Meli Meli harmoniously blends with the natural beauty of the surrounding environment. The Meli Meli offers tastefully decorated and well-appointed guest rooms, equipped with kitchenette facilities and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Grocery delivery can be provided on request and at extra charge. Its location, although quiet and secluded, offers easy access to Fira town, with its numerous restaurants, bars and shops.

name: La Noi Houses
description: Built with respect to the local architecture, featuring arches and whitewashed walls, La Noi Houses offers accommodation with air conditioning in Éxo Goniá, just a 10-minute drive from the Black Beach in Kamari. Fira Town is a 20-minute drive away. Each accommodation features a living room, fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Some units include a spacious terrace and/or balcony with sea views. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette with a fridge. Every unit features a private bathroom with towels, free toiletries and bath or shower. Bed linen is available. La Noi Houses also includes a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site. Car hire is available at the property and the area is popular for horse riding and snorkelling. A bus station can be found just a few metres away. Several restaurants and wineries can be reached within short walking distance. Oia is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Santorini (Thira) Airport, 2 km from La Noi Houses.

name: Dome Santorini Resort & Spa
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Imerovigli, Dome Santorini Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as complimentary tea, closet, towels, clothes rack, slippers. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, outdoor pool, massage, garden. Dome Santorini Resort is an excellent choice from which to explore Santorini or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Villa Soula
description: Villa Soula in Santorini, built in traditional Cycladic style, is located only 150 metres from the famous and astonishing cliffs (Caldera) in Santorini. Villa Soula’s privileged location offers proximity to Fira Town and its cosmopolitan atmosphere. The friendly atmosphere, excellent service and pleasant surroundings promise an unforgetable holiday. Villa Soula, with its simple beauty, has recently renovated. An attractive new outdoor pool awaits guests to swim or enjoy your drink. The complex has standard rooms and apartments for 1 to 4 persons. Each room has a balcony or leads out onto the garden and the swimming pool.

name: William's Houses
description: Located in Akrotiri Village of Santorini, William’s Houses features studios and apartments with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea, the Volcano and the Caldera. The property lies within 2.5 km from the red sandy beach and offers free Wi-Fi in all areas. Elegantly decorated with soft colours and white furnishings, the air-conditioned units of William’s have a seating area and a kitchenette with fridge and cooking hobs. Each studio and apartment is equipped with a safe and a flat-screen TV, while some also include a washing machine. Restaurants and mini markets can be found within a short walk from the property. William’s Houses is situated 2 km from the Archeological Site of Akrotiri and 11 km from the capital Fira. Ormos Athinios Port is at 9 km, while Santorini International Airport is 14 km away. Car rental services can be provided and free private parking is possible on site.

name: Caldera's Dolphin Suites
description: Located in Megalochori Village, Caldera’s Dolphin boasts a heated outdoor pool with sunbeds and a pool bar. Featuring free Wi-Fi, the spacious accommodation looks out onto the caldera and Aegean Sea from its balcony. Featuring modern and fresh decoration, all accommodation types at the Caldera's Dolphin have a coffee machine and mini fridge. Some units include a seating area. Each enjoys air conditioning, a TV and a bathroom with slippers, toiletries and hairdryer. Caldera’s Dolphin provides private parking on site. Red Beach and Perivolos Beach are within 3 km. It is 8 km from the bustling Fira Town. Athinios Port is at a distance of 4 km, while Santorini Airport is 7 km away.

name: Divelia East
description: Boasting sea views, Divelia East provides accommodation around 200 metres from Skaros. Featuring free private parking, the bed and breakfast is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as horse riding and cycling. Your air-conditioned suite at the bed and breakfast consists of an open sleeping area with a king-sized bed, a seating area and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea/coffee making facilities are also featured. A à la carte breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Divelia East offers a terrace. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 8 km from Divelia East, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Villa Koronios
description: No description found

name: Melidonia Suites
description: Set in Akrotiri, within 1.4 km of Kokkinopetra Beach and 1.7 km of Caldera Beach, Melidonia Suites offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a sea view. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Archaeological Site of Akrotiri is 3 km from Melidonia Suites, while Santorini Port is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Cavo Tagoo Santorini
description: Located 5 km from Fira and 6 km from Oia, the Cavo Tagoo Santorini is an exclusive all-suite hotel offering luxurious accommodation, sunset views and personalized services. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. The modernly decorated suites feature either a hot tub or a private pool, designer items and include a 43" flat-screen TV with satellite channels, DVD player and a veranda or terrace. The Vezenes restaurant serves Inspired Greek open fire grill bistro cuisine in its elegant interior or at the terrace, while guests can also enjoy cocktails, refreshments and light meals at the hotel's pool bar. Cavo Tagoo Santorini can arrange boat trips to nearby islands and private daily cruises. The hotel also offers car hire via concierge. The hotel’s 24-hour front desk and can arrange laundry service and newspaper delivered to your door. The nearest airport is Santorini (Thira) Airport, 10 km from Cavo Tagoo Santorini. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Atlantis Hotel
description: Located in central Fira, with a panoramic view of the caldera and Aegean Sea, Atlantis Hotel combines traditional Cycladic architecture with modern facilities including a pool and a hot tub. The elegantly decorated rooms are equipped with modern amenities ensuring comfort. Most rooms have a truly unique view of the caldera and Aegean Sea. Atlantis provides free wireless internet connection, 24 hour front desk service, and free parking at nearby public location. The central location of Atlantis, very close to the Archaeological Museum makes it the perfect base for leisurely strolls at Fira’s picturesque village.

name: Santorini Secret Premium
description: No description found

name: Athina Luxury Suites
description: Nestled upon a rock in Fira Town, the Cycladic-style Athina Luxury Suites feature a swimming pool and a sun terrace with panoramic views of the Caldera and the volcano. They offer air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony or terrace and provide free WiFi in public areas. All units are comfortable and spacious, carved inside the volcanic earth according to the unique traditional style of the island’s architecture. They are all equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen, satellite TV and iPod dock. All units enjoy panoramic views over the Aegean Sea, the Caldera and the volcano. An array of meals, drinks and snacks are served at the property's bar restaurant, or at your suite. Several restaurants and bars can be reached within a short walk. Athina Luxury Suites is conveniently located within a short walking distance from Fira’s centre, where a variety of shops can be found. Ormos Athinios Port is 3.5 km away, while Santorini National Airport is at a distance of 7 km. Airport and port shuttle service can be arranged upon request and at extra charge.

name: Katikies Garden Santorini - The Leading Hotels Of The World
description: Set in Fira, 400 metres from Archaeological Museum of Thera, Katikies Garden Santorini - The Leading Hotels Of The World offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Katikies Garden Santorini - The Leading Hotels Of The World all rooms include bed linen and towels. An American, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Orthodox Metropolitan Cathedral, Museum of Prehistoric Thera and Central Bus Station. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 6 km from Katikies Garden Santorini - The Leading Hotels Of The World.

name: La Maltese Caldera Concept
description: La Maltese is located at the highest point of the Caldera, 250 metres above the sea, on the top of Imerovigli. It offers an exclusive spa centre with hot tub and hamam and spectacular views of the volcano and the cliff. This neoclassic mansion is a true sample of luxury. The feeling of intimacy is projected through each of its rooms and suites. Each air-conditioned unit has a CD player, satellite TV and safety deposit box. Bathrooms are stocked with a hairdryer, fluffy bathrobes and slippers. The pool area offers a 250 square metres veranda overlooking the caldera. Sun beds are also featured. The pool bar next to the pool serves drinks, cocktails and a great selection of champagnes. Full breakfast is served at the time and place of the guest’s preference. The Lounge menu is available every day from noon until late in the evening. It is a selection of international dishes. La Maltese Restaurant serves à la carte candlelit dinners on an open-air veranda with spectacular views.

name: Tholos Resort
description: The 4-star Tholos Resort is situated in Imerovigli, one of the most beautiful villages in Santorini. Sitting on the cliff of the Caldera the hotel enjoys panoramic views of the sea and the volcano. All stylish suites open to a balcony with views over the volcano. They all include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests can start their day with a rich American breakfast served in the comfort of their private balcony or at the restaurant’s terrace. At the swimming pool, guests can relax with a coffee, soft drink or cocktail from the bar. The helpful staff are always on hand offering advice and assistance.

name: Astro Palace Hotel & Suites
description: Astro Palace Hotel & Suites is situated in an idyllic location, only a short walk from Fira and the caldera. It offers a wellness centre, a swimming pool and rooms with unobstructed Aegean Sea views. The elegant, air-conditioned rooms combine contemporary design with traditional architecture. They are fitted with a satellite LCD TV and minibar, while some also have a spa bath or private pool. Each room also has large balcony or terrace overlooking the Aegean and free Wi-Fi. Guests can use the well-equipped gym, the hot tub and the sauna or relax at the sun beds by the swimming pool. Cassiopeia Spa’ provides a wide selection of massages, facial and body treatments. Pleiades restaurant serves a variety of menus all day and guests can combine their meal with a wine tasting experience, while they are enjoying stunning views of Aegean Sea. Refreshments and snacks are provided at the pool bar. The hotel is just 5 km from Santorini Airport and 8 km away from Santorini port. Laptops and i-pads are available upon request and free private parking is available near the premises.

name: Rk Beach Hotel
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace, the beachfront RK Beach Hotel is located right on Kamari Beach in Santorini. Guests may enjoy à la carte menus at the on site restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout. Each room at RK Beach Hotel is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Views of the sea, mountains or pool are featured in certain rooms. Every room includes a private bathroom, while some are also stocked with an outdoor jetted tub. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests may enjoy beverages and soft drinks at the on site bar. Airport shuttle services can be provided upon request. Winery is 2.9 km from RK Beach Hotel. Thira Airport is 3 km from the property.

name: Kastro Suites
description: The Cycladic-style Kastro Suites is ideally located on the unique Santorini caldera in Fira, 300 metres above sea level. It offers a spacious hot tub and elegant accommodation overlooking the caldera, the Aegean Sea and the sunset. Featuring wrought-iron furnishings, light colours with blue details and stylish decoration, all suites at the Kastro offer a TV with satellite channels and sofa. Each has a fridge. Bathrooms are stocked with bathrobes, hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can relax with a drink at the bar, with stunning caldera views. There is also the choice of breakfast served in the suites. Staff at the tour desk can offer information on nearby attractions such as the scenic Oia within 11 km. Santorini Airport is 8 km away.

name: Kymata Hotel
address: Kamari Post Box 5350 Thalias Apollonos Corner, Thera 847 00
description: Family-run Kymata Hotel offers air-conditioned accommodation 40 metres from Kamari Beach. It features rooms with private balconies and free Wi-Fi in public hotel areas. Decorated with pastel colours, the non-smoking rooms and studios at Kymata are simple and welcoming. They all include a TV set with 11 satellite channels, hairdryer and fridge. Daily cleaning service is provided. Kymata Hotel is 4 km from Santorini Airport, 8 km from Fira and 9 km from Athinios Port. Staff at the tour desk provide luggage storage and assist with car hire. Located 70 metres from Kamari centre, Kymata Hotel is next to restaurants, tourist shops and seaside cafes. The bus stop is at 150 metres and free public parking is available at 100 metres.

name: The Chania Hotel
description: No description found

name: Samaria Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Chania, within 450 metres from the Venetian harbour, the modern Samaria Hotel is ideally situated just above the main square, next to the central bus station. An outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace are featured on site. Fully renovated, Samaria hotel offers air-conditioned accommodation equipped with a balcony, hardwood floors and marble bathroom. Each unit has a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. All accommodations enjoy a complimentary buffet breakfast. Guests may enjoy Mediterranean and Cretan cuisine at the on-site restaurant. A fitness centre is also available. Whether for business or holiday, the hotel offers a warm and friendly service coupled with modern facilities, including a café-bar and internet corner. Private parking is possible.

name: Royal Sun Hotel
description: Featuring a restaurant and a pool with sun terrace amidst its palm-tree garden, Royal Sun lies within 3 km from the centre of Chania Town. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony overlooking the Cretan Sea and the town. Fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows, the rooms of Royal Sun are decorated with green-wooden furniture and soft colours. Each unit is equipped with LCD satellite TV, a safe and a fridge. A hairdryer and free toiletries can be found in the private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the dining area, while guests can also enjoy Greek and Mediterranean dishes at the on-site restaurant. Coffees, refreshing drinks and cocktails are served at the lounge bar throughout the day. Sport facilities include a fitness centre. Staff at the front desk can arrange car rental. Royal Sun is situated 6 km from Souda Port and 12 km from Chania International Airport. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on the scenic Venetian Port of Chania at 3 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Abella Hotel
description: Located in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, 300 metres from Agia Marina Beach, Abella Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Providing a bar, the property is located within 600 metres of Stalos Beach. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a patio and others also provide guests with city views. Platanias Beach is 2 km from Abella Hotel, while Platanias Square is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International, 22 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Nek Suites
description: Set 3.1 km from House-Museum of Eleftherios Venizelos, NEK Suites offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden and air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, pool views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A microwave and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A car rental service is available at NEK Suites. Archaeological Museum of Chania is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Saint Anargyri Church is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 9 km from NEK Suites.

name: Flamingos Hotel Apartments
description: With garden views, Flamingos Hotel Apartments is located in Kato Daratso and has room service, bar, garden, year-round outdoor pool and children's playground. Free WiFi is provided. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. A car rental service is available at Flamingos Apartments. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Glaros Beach, Iguana Beach and Yannis Beach. The nearest airport is Chania International, 19 km from Flamingos Hotel Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Stellina Village
description: Situated in Kato Daratso in the Crete region and Chryssi Akti reachable within 200 metres, Stellina Village features accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All self-catered units feature tiled floors and are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchenette with a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or pool views. The restaurant at the aparthotel specialises in local cuisine. The wellness area at Stellina Village is comprised of a beauty services and a fitness centre. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Stellina Village include Kladissos Beach, Yannis Beach and Nea Chora Beach. The nearest airport is Chania International, 16 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa Kallergi
description: No description found

name: Ambassadors Residence Boutique Hotel Chania
description: Located at Chania Venetian Harbour, Ambassadors Residence is a restored 1890’s house. It features elegant and individually decorated accommodation with free WiFi. Chania City Centre is a 5-minute walk away. Fitted with stylish items and stone details, all air-conditioned rooms and suites of Ambassadors have a seating area with a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Most units come with Cretan Sea and old harbour views, while others with a spa bath and a terrace or a balcony. Bathrobes, slippers and toiletries are included in the private bathroom. A 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge are featured in the property facilities. Spa and wellness therapies, as well as beauty treatments can be arranged upon request and at extra charge. A bakery and a mini market for the basic supplies are a 3-minute walk away. Kum Kapi district, with small beach, several bars and seaside tavernas, is a 10-15 minute walk away and Nea Chora Beach is a 15-minute walk away. Souda Port is at a distance of 9 km and Ioannis Daskalogiannis International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Serenissima Boutique Hotel
description: The 5-star Serenissima Boutique Hotel is situated in a 15th century Venetian house in the scenic town of Chania 100 metres from the beach. It offers elegant suites with free WiFi 30 metres from cafes and shops. Featuring arched ceilings and traditional furnishings with modern touches, all accommodation types at the Serenissima Boutique Hotel have a seating area with flat-screen TV and sofa. Each has a dining area and a stylish bathroom with bath and luxury toiletries. A pillow menu is available. Breakfast is served in the suites. Drinks and coffee are served at the bar. The property is 100 metres from Archaeological Museum of Chani and 300 metres from the Venetian Harbour. Souda Airport is 11 km away.

name: Casa Delfino Hotel & Spa
description: Situated in the heart of Chania’s charming old town, this authentic 17th-century Venetian mansion offers a personalised service along with a courtyard and rooftop terrace overlooking the town and the Venetian harbour. Each spacious room combines old world charm with modern comforts. From the marble bathrooms and rich fabrics to the LCD TV and free wireless internet, every effort has been taken to ensure your comfort. Enjoy a sumptuous breakfast served every day in Casa Delfino’s courtyard. A stylish bar offers a range of drinks. The Casa Delfino Spa features a marble steam room, an extra large hot tub and a soothing relaxation area. The staff at Casa Delfino will be more than happy to offer information and other suggestions for your leisure time. Access to Spa facilities is provided upon charge. Casa Delfino enjoys a superb location within the picturesque narrow streets of Chania’s old town, just a short stroll from the sea.

name: Kedrissos Hotel
description: Featuring a 150m2 pool with separate children’s section, Kedrissos Hotel consists of self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi. The bar-restaurant comes with indoor and outdoor area. The beaches of Aptera and Chrissi Akti are 500 metres away. Decorated in soft colours, all air-conditioned apartments open to a balcony with mountain view. Each comes with a kitchenette or kitchen to prepare a breakfast or light meal. A TV and private bathroom are included. Kedrissos Hotel lies 2 km from the scenic town of Chania and 9 km from Souda Port. Daskalogiannis International Airport is at a distance of 15 km. Free on-site parking is available.

name: The Tanneries Hotel & Spa
description: In a beautiful seaside setting, The Tanneries is a minimalist boutique that invites guests to connect with Chania’s past. Four conjoining, former tannery buildings have been renovated into an architectural slice of Cretan history. Here, 20 spacious suites present guests with airy, bright interior spaces, many of which overlook the sea. The building’s industrial character is preserved, highlighting natural materials that combine to form for a clean, minimalist look. Periplous Seaside restaurant serves fresh, organic local ingredients complemented by a bar with signature cocktails and local wines, while a fitness/spa/wellness center offers moments of pure relaxation.Marriott

name: Boutique Hotel Fortino
description: Set in a listed Venetian building, Boutique Hotel Fortino enjoys a quiet and scenic location on a pedestrian street in Chania’s Venetian Port. Wi-Fi is free in the entire hotel, while free public parking is available at 20 metres. The spacious suites and apartments feature lofts and modern minimal furniture. They are air conditioned with balcony enjoying port and city views.Each has an LCD satellite TV, free WiFi and a fully equipped kitchen. Free chocolates, marmalade, traditional spoon sweets and local spirits are provided in all accommodation types. The modern bathrooms come with a luxurious spa bath or shower. Chania’s nightlife and seafront are within a 10 metres’ distance, while the closest organized beaches are just 500m away. The hotel staff will be happy to assist you with restaurant recommendations and information about Chania and Crete.

name: Oniros Residences
description: Offering free WiFi, Oniros Residence is located in Souda Port, Chania. It offers a rooftop pool, a gym and a spa. Offering views over the sea, all rooms in the hotel come with a balcony, and they are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine and a fridge. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. You can also have lunch and dinner on site. Chania Old Venetian Harbour is 7 km away. Mitropoleos Square is 6 km from Oniros Residence, while Municipal Art Gallery of Chania is 6 km from the property. Chania International Airport is 8 km away and airport shuttle from the airport to the property is provided with additional charge.

name: Elia Agia Marina Resort
description: Set in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, a few steps from Agia Marina Beach, Elia Agia Marina Resort offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms have a balcony. Every room has air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Elia Agia Marina Resort have a sea view. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Elia Agia Marina Resort offers a hammam. Stalos Beach is less than 1 km from the resort, while Platanias Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 22 km from Elia Agia Marina Resort.

name: Yakinthos Hotel
address: Irakli Avgoula Street 1 - Agii Apostoli, Chania
description: Located west of Chania, this hotel is on the route to Agia Marina-Platanias and is only 40 metres from the magnificent sandy beaches of Glaros and Agii Apostoli. The Nikolidakis family have run the hotel for the past 9 years with much success, offering a comfortable, warm atmosphere only found in such small, family-run hotels. This hotel offers an ideal solution for those people who want to enjoy their stay away from the crowds, yet remain close to the sights and hot spots of Chania. The hotel is 18 km from Chania Airport and 10 km from the Souda fairgrounds. We offer a lavish buffet breakfast and 39 air-conditioned rooms, all comfortable and well-equipped to create a relaxing atmosphere. All guests are offered a free welcome drink.

name: Ostrakon Suites
description: No description found

name: Sirios Village Hotel
description: Located 4 km away from the centre of Chania, Sirios Village Hotel & Bungalows features an extensive pool area and a tennis court set within lush gardens. It offers accommodation with balcony, and it is 300 metres from the beach. Sirios rooms and apartments are bright and tastefully furnished. They are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and hairdryer. Some units enjoy views to the Cretan Sea, while others have a hot tub. Guests can enjoy traditional Cretan cuisine at the hotel’s buffet restaurant. There is also an a la carte restaurant offering a wide wine selection. Sirios bar is ideal for an evening cocktail by the pool. Chania International Airport is 14 km away from the hotel. The seaside town of Platanias is within a 10-minute drive. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Dore Hotel
description: Situated 250 metres from the seaside area of Agia Marina, Dore Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a TV. It features a swimming pool with children's area, a pool bar and a restaurant. Dore Boutique Hotel rooms are tastefully decorated, air conditioned and open to a balcony, most with views over the Cretan Sea. They have a safety deposit box, a coffee maker and a private bathroom with shower. The hotel’s restaurant serves buffet breakfast and dinner, traditional Greek cuisine and snacks. Dore Boutique Hotel also has a bar offering coffees, drinks and cocktails. The picturesque city of Chania is 9 km away, while Souda Port is at 16 km and Chania Airport at 31 km. Wi-Fi access and on-site parking are provided free of charge.

name: Domes Zeen Chania, a Luxury Collection Resort, Crete
description: At Domes Zeen we emphasize community, sustainability, and slow living in an elegant setting. Nestled in a protected cove, a short drive from the Town of Chania, and offering spectacular views of the town and the sea, Domes Zeen is a destination in itself. We create the ultimate sensation of togetherness right in the heart of your Cretan sanctuary. Immerse yourself in a gourmet dining experience surrounded by the splendor of nature. Retreat to your private villa for restful moments on your private terrace or balcony before falling asleep under the stars to the silence of nature. This is your Domes Zeen experience, designed to awaken all senses.Marriott

name: Christina Beach Hotel
description: Located in Chania Town, a few steps from Nea Chora Beach, Christina Beach Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and a kids' club. At the hotel, the rooms come with a terrace with a sea view. Christina Beach Hotel offers certain rooms that include a patio, and each room is fitted with a coffee machine. Guest rooms at the accommodation are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Continental and Full English/Irish breakfast options are available daily at Christina Beach Hotel. Speaking German, Greek, English and French at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Municipal Art Gallery of Chania, Firkas Fortress and Mitropoleos Square. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 14 km from Christina Beach Hotel.

name: Hotel Christina
description: With a stunning location right on Chania’s beachfront, Hotel Christina features sea-view rooms and has a 2,000-m² garden that leads right to the beach. The 2-star resort has an outdoor heated pool and a children’s pool. The self-catered studios are elegantly furnished and feature a kitchenette equipped with kitchenware and fridge. They are air conditioned, and include a satellite TV, safe and direct dial telephone. Wi-Fi is free throughout the premises. Guests can enjoy relaxed moments on the beach, and sun beds and umbrellas are available to hire. Snacks are available at the beach bar. Just a 10-minute walk from Chania’s centre, Christina Hotel is ideally based for relaxation, as well as sightseeing.

name: Nival Luxury Suites
description: Nival Luxury Suites are set 150 metres from Chania Town and just 50 metres from the scenic Chania Venetian Harbour. Free WiFi is available throughout. These elegantly decorated are equipped with LED smart TVs with satellite channels. All units come with a safety deposit box, a small kitchen with a microwave, a kettle and a minibar with various snacks, tea and coffee. Guests may relax at the seating area of each apartment. There is a private bathroom with bathrobes, towels and free toiletries in each unit. The suites open to private balconies. All children are welcome at this property. The nearest beach is Nea Chora, just 300 metres away. Within a 5-minute walk, guests can reach the bus station offering access to Agioi Apostoloi, Agia Marina, Platanias and many other beaches. A mini market for basic supplies, a pharmacy and an ATM can be found just a short walk away. Breakfast is served in a nearby seaside cafe, at the heart on the Old Venetian Harbour, with the amazing view of the Lighthouse. This place is just a 3-minute walk from the property. The Archaeological Museum of Chania and the Municipal Art Gallery of Chania are at 100 metres away.The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 10 km from Nival Luxury Suites.

name: Residenza Vranas Boutique Hotel
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a Smart TV and Netflix. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Casa Kasteli
description: Casa Kasteli is located on Kasteli Hill, a quiet neighbourhood within the Old City of Chania and just 200 metres away from the Old Port. It offers all the characteristics of traditional Cretan hospitality. Its owner will make you feel at home and he will cater for all your needs, to ensure your pleasant stay. Guests staying at Casa Kasteli can benefit from the free wireless internet.

name: Areti Suites
description: Featuring modernly decorated rooms and a snack bar, Areti Suites is surrounded by a well-tended garden, 2 km from Kalathas Beach. Complimentary Wi-Fi is provided. All air-conditioned rooms are fitted with upholstered beds in bright colours, wallpapers and hypo-allergic mattresses and linens. Opening to a balcony with garden or mountain views, each includes a minibar and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom offers a shower with hydromassage panel, a hairdryer and slippers. Areti Suites is located 2 km from Chania International Airport and 10 km from Souda Port. Staff can arrange car rental to explore the main town of Chania with the Venetian Harbour, at 8 km. Free bicycles and on-site parking are available.

name: Lena Beach Hotel
description: Lena Beach Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with a balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea. It is located only 50 metres from the beach of Kalatha and 100 metres from bars and restaurants. All air-conditioned rooms include a TV with satellite channels, fridge and a bathroom with shower and bath. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. Guests can relax at the bar or the pool. Alternatively, they can visit the town of Chania, with its Venetian fortress, 12 km from Hotel Lena Beach. Chania International Airport is 8 km away. The property offers free parking on site.

name: Athina Beach Hotel
description: Built on the seaside resort of Agii Apostoli, the modern hotel Athina Beach offers a pool with adjacent bar and sun-lounger terrace. It is only 3 km from Chania Town. Athina Beach offers self-catered studios and apartments, complete with satellite LCD TV. In-room wired and wireless internet is free, as well as the use of air conditioning. All units include a well-equipped kitchenette with fridge. Safety box is available upon surcharge. There are shops and restaurants within walking distance. A pine tree park separates the hotel from 3 beaches, just 300 metres away. The surrounding area is fully developed with super markets and traditional taverns. Free public parking is possible.

name: Chania Urban Living
description: Chania Urban Living are located in Chania Town. It offers self-catering accommodation with a furnished patio overlooking the garden. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. The modern holiday house will provide you with a satellite, flat-screen TV, a fireplace and air conditioning. There is also a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, and a bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Other facilities offered at Chania Urban Living include grocery deliveries, dry cleaning and an ironing service. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Historical Museum of Chania within 1.5 km. This holiday home is 13 km from Souda Airport. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Alexandros Studios
description: This apartment complex stands 4.5 km from Chania city on a hillside overlooking the sea and Kalamaki beach, one of the most beautiful places on the island. The tastefully decorated and modern accommodation features a cosy atmosphere and every room includes a kitchenette. All rooms enjoy direct access to the garden or balcony with sea views. Guests can start their day with the continental breakfast. The complex is set in a natural environment of extensive gardens with an outdoor swimming pool. The beach is only 200 metres away and there is a regular bus service into town where you can visit the picturesque harbour. The residence is also near the motorway, providing easy access to the surrounding area.

name: Kavos Hotel & Suites
description: At a quiet and beautiful location on the coast of Kavos, Kavos Hotel & Suites boasts views over the Cretan Sea. It offers well-designed accommodation and a large outdoor pool with sun terrace. Set amidst landscaped gardens, all apartments and studios at Kavos are air conditioned and have a spacious balcony or terrace. They are fitted with an LCD TV, kitchenette and fridge, and enjoy free Internet access. The poolside bar offers sea views. It serves continental breakfast, snacks, cocktails and refreshing drinks. The hotel organizes diving courses and provides diving equipment to its guests free of charge. The village Stavros is only a 2-minute drive away. It has a lovely beach and offers traditional taverns. Chania International Airport is at 9 km. Free parking is available on site.

name: Isida Hotel
description: Set in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, Isida Hotel Agia Marina features a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a shared lounge. The property features a children's playground. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, 2 flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a bath. Isida Hotel Agia Marina offers some units with sea views, and every room includes a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Chania Town is 10 km from the accommodation, while Georgioupolis is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 24 km from Isida Hotel Agia Marina.

name: Marika Hotel
description: Offering sea-view studios, Marika Hotel is situated directly on Platania’s beachfront. Highlights include an outdoor pool with a pool bar restaurant by the sea and an Italian restaurant. The resort’s busy center is only 200 meters from the hotel. Guests can enjoy the breakfast buffet that is served by the sea. Snacks and drinks are available on the poolside. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Marika Hotel’s cafe bar also features a wide-screen TV for your entertainment. Platanias is located in west Crete, just 11 km west of Chania. Guests of the Marika also benefit from free parking on-site.

name: Avra Imperial Hotel
description: Built within 65,000 m² of gardens, Avra Imperial Hotel features a 1,500-m² pool area with a pool bar in the middle. The resort is 100 metres from Kolimvari Beach. The ultramodern guest rooms have a large bathroom with a tub and a shower, and are fitted with parquet floors. A flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and free Wi-Fi are standard. Some rooms have a private or shared pool, or a spacious terrace with hot tub. The Avra Imperial Hotel offers 3 swimming pools, including a freshwater children’s pool. The spa offers 10 massage rooms and a beauty salon. A state-of-the-art gym, steam room, Finnish sauna and indoor pool are available. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the main restaurant offering a pool-facing terrace. Guests can sample traditional Cretan, Italian and international dishes at the hotel’s 4 à la carte restaurants. Room service is available. The hotel is a 2-minute walk to the centre of Kolimvari and 23 km west of Chania. The hotel is 35 km from Chania International Airport. The famous Samaria gorge is a 40-minute drive (58 km).

name: Elma's Dream Apartments & Villas
description: Just 100 metres from the crystal clear waters of Chrisi Akti Beach, Elma’s Dream offers a quiet retreat with a swimming pool, with special section for children, a restaurant and a poolside bar. Elma’s Dream offers comfortably furnished studios and apartments, each with spacious seating area, equipped kitchenette with refrigerator, mini oven and coffee machine. They all have a balcony and some of them share a big terrace as well. Elma’s Dream is perfectly located 3.5km from Chania’s centre, 15km from the airport and 7km from the port. The bus stop is just 50m away.

name: Creta Vitalis
description: Only 8 km from Chania Town, family-run Creta Vitalis enjoys a quiet location 400 metres from the beach, in the resort of Kalathas. It is surrounded by Mediterranean garden, and its swimming pool faces the sea and the scenic bay. Most rooms have a balcony with sea view. Each has air conditioning, a TV, telephone, fridge and hairdryer. For longer stays or guests who just prefer home comforts, the apartments and bungalows have kitchen facilities. You can enjoy refreshing drinks on the terrace, while admiring the ever-changing colours of the horizon. The nearby restaurants serve famous Cretan dishes and fresh fish. Extending over 10,000 m2 of land, Creta Vitalis is 9 km from Souda Port and just 6 km from Ioannis Daskalogiannis Airport.

name: Erietta Suites
description: Located in the scenic Chania Old Town, Erietta Suites features self-catering accommodation with views of the Venetian Harbour. Restaurants, cafés and shops lie within 150 metres, while Nea Chora Beach is 600 metres away. Free WiFi is provided. Each with a kitchenette, all units at Erietta is fitted with wooden floors and beamed ceilings. Guests will enjoy Cretan Sea or town views from the windows or balcony. In room facilities include a seating area, iron and hairdryer. Erietta Suites lies 100 metres from the Maritime Museum of Crete and 200 metres from Firkas Fortress. Ioannis Daskalogiannis International Airport is 11 km away.

name: New Kydonia Suites & Studios
address: Kon/os Kalaitzis St, Daratsos, PO Box 87, Nea Kydonia, Chania
description: Located in Kato Daratso, 1.6 km from Glaros Beach, New Kydonia Suites & Studios provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The property is around 1.7 km from Iguana Beach, 2 km from Kalamaki Beach and 2.4 km from Municipal Garden. The hotel has a children's playground and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel each room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. New Kydonia Suites & Studios features certain rooms with mountain views, and each room includes a balcony. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. The area is popular for snorkelling and cycling, in addition, bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel. Fransiscan Monastery of Agios Fragkiskos is 2.4 km from New Kydonia Suites & Studios, while Municipal Art Gallery of Chania is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Cathrin Suites
description: Cathrine Suites is set in the historic Acrotiri, only a 2-minute walk from the beach of Zorbas. It offers self-catering accommodation, a pool with children’s section and a garden with barbeque corner. The spacious rooms at Cathrine Suites have kitchenette facilities and coffee makers. They all enjoy beautiful sea views from their large windows and private balconies. Free Wi-Fi is also available. A welcome basket with local honey, fruits, wine and locally produced tsikoudia is offered upon arrival. Cathrin Suites’ reception is available 24-7 and may provide guests with safety boxes, or make car rental arrangements. Cathrin Suites is 8 km from Chania Airport and 12 km from Chania centre and Souda Bay.

name: Althea Village - Family Hotel
description: Althea Village is 600 metres away from the beach of Agioi Apostoloi. It offers 4 swimming pools, a traditional restaurant, a gym and 2 bars, as well as various accommodation types, all with private balcony. The Althea Village rooms, apartments and suites are decorated in a traditional style and each of them features its own private balcony, air conditioning, refrigerator, satellite TV, telephone and safe. Guests enjoy 2 swimming pools for adults, plus 2 pools for children, and an extensive sunbathing terrace with sun loungers and umbrellas. Cretan cuisine is served at the traditional tavern Aktaion. The pool-side snack bar Elia serves drinks, cocktails or snacks under the shade of an ancient olive tree. Bar Artemis offers table tennis tables, pool tables and electronic games. Althea Village also offers a playground and a gym. The centre of Chania is 4 km away and is connected with regular bus service. Within a short distance from the Althea Village, guests can find water sports, horse riding and mini golf facilities.

name: Tree of Life Art Hotel
address: Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, Nea Kydonia
description: Just 20 metres from Agia Marina Beach in Chania, Tree of Life Art Hotel offers uniquely decorated accommodation with free Wi-Fi. The property has an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and a pool-side snack bar. Featuring earthy and warm colours, all air-conditioned units open to a furnished balcony, most with views to the pool or garden. Each includes a kitchenette with a fridge, cooking hobs and dining area. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are offered in the private bathroom. Facilities include an art gift shop. Tree of Life is 8 km from Chania Old Town with its cobbled streets and Venetian lighthouse. Souda Port and Chania International Airport are at 17 km. Free parking is provided on site.

name: Iolida Beach
description: Just a few metres from Agia Marina Beach, Iolida Beach Hotel comprises of 2 buildings linked with an impressive glass-walkway bridge providing easy access to all areas of the hotel. Simply yet elegantly furnished, most bright units at Iolida open to a private balcony. Each comes with free wired internet, a TV and a kitchenette with oven and mini fridge. A hairdryer and free toiletries are included. Guests may start their day with a buffet breakfast at the on-site, à la carte restaurant, where lunch and dinner dishes are served. Light meals and refreshing beverages are prepared at the snack bar. Sun loungers are offered by the pool where guests may relax or enjoy a game of billiards. Meeting facilities as well as a children’s playground for the younger guests’ entertainment are available. A fitness centre is at the disposal of those who are interested in keeping fit, while massage treatments are featured. Several taverns and bars can be found within short walking distance. Souda Port is 17 km away and the city of Chania with its scenic old port is at a distance of 10 km. Ioannis Daskalogiannis International Airport is 30 km away.

name: Oscar Suites & Village
description: No description found

name: Talos Hotel Apartments
description: Just 4 km west of the city of Chania and a mere 80 metres from the beach, the newly built Talos Hotel offers spacious accommodation in the seaside village of Agioi Apostoli. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The well appointed studios and apartments are equipped with free WiFi, kitchen and satellite TV. Most units have air conditioning and a spacious balcony with view to the forest, garden or the pool. The on-site restaurant serves Cretan dishes and grills throughout the day. Certified Greek breakfast is served in the morning including among others fresh orange juice, homemade bread, local honey and a choice of traditional dishes, such as fried eggs with local bacon or traditional pies drizzled with honey. Talos Hotel offers great swimming options, being located next to 3 beaches. Agii Apostoli is one of the greenest areas in the island and combines natural beauty with modern facilities.

name: Elizabeth Suites
description: Esteemed guests are welcome to relax in a quite and elegant setting. Beautiful twofloor suites with one bedroom, kitchen equipment bathroom with tab, livingroom and excellent sea view are only some of the benefits that we offer. The suites are located 4 km from the town of Chania and the traditional old harbour and 8 km from Souda port. Nearby you will find restaurants, supermarkets, coffee shops, and shopping malls.The suites offer free wifi connection, tv with DVD and air condition. In the building you will also find swimming pool and jaccuzi with eight seats. The "Elizabeth Suites" promises to make your stay in Chania relaxing and unforgettable.VRBO

name: Minos Village
address: Agia Marina, 73 014 Chania Crete, Agia Marina
description: Offering a pool and a restaurant, Minos Village is in the beach resort of Agia Marina. It features self-catering accommodation with balcony or terrace. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Agia Marina Beach is a short walk away. Apartments at Minos Village have a TV and air conditioning.There is a full a kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy garden view from the room. At Minos Village you will find a garden, a terrace with sun loungers and a bar. Other facilities like a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage are offered. The property offers free, private parking. The property is approximately 10 km from the scenic town of Chania and a short walk to the sea front. Souda Airport is located 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Sun City
description: In the attractive area of Agii Apostoli, Kato Daratso, you will be in an ideal spot to explore the beauties of the island, immediately surrounded by stillness and serenity. With a warm family atmosphere offered through typical Cretan hospitality, we are conveniently situated just 300 metres from the sandy beach and 4 km west from the city centre. For ease of travel, our studios are 9 km from Souda Port and 19 km from Chania Airport. All accommodation is modern and well-equipped, including a large balcony with a beautiful view. In a short distance from the studios, there are also many taverns (Greek-style restaurants), supermarkets and a variety of shops. Activities nearby include horse-riding, tennis, water sports and a water park. The intense nightlife of the city centre is enhanced by the variety of clubs and discos on offer.

name: Alianthos Suites
description: Located just 100 metres from Tarsanas sandy beach, Alianthos Suites offers self-catered units built within a beautiful garden. It has a swimming pool and a private bay overlooking the Cretan Sea. Alianthos features spacious, tastefully decorated rooms with balconies or verandas enjoying sea or garden views. They all have a well equipped kitchen with dining area. Other in-room facilities include air conditioning, satellite TV and safety box. At the swimming pool area, surrounded by the hotel’s gardens, guests can find sun loungers and umbrellas. There is also a pool bar serving snacks and refreshing beverages. The more active guests will find a tennis court located right next to the sea. Alianthos Suites also features a children’s playground and BBQ facilities. Alianthos hotel offers Wi-Fi access and free private on-site parking. Chania airport is a 10-minute drive away and Souda Port is a 15-minute drive. The town of Chania is at 13 km.

name: Renieris Hotel
description: Situated upon a hill in Kato Stalos is the family run Renieris Hotel. It is just 200 metres from the beach and 8 kilometres from the famous and busy city of Chania. Renieris is built amphitheatrically offering great views of the Aegean Sea, Thodorou’s island and the olive groves of Stalos. Its rooms feature air-conditioning, satellite TV and refrigerator and all en-suite rooms have private balconies. Safety box is also available and charges are applicable. Renieris Hotel has a large swimming pool with a sun terrace, as well as a smaller pool for the children. The covered pool bar offers snacks and refreshments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel, while wired Internet is also available in public areas, and free on-site parking is also possible. In Kato Stalos you will find many restaurants, taverns and supermarkets. Hotel Renieris is also 1,5 km away from the picturesque village of Pano Stalos where you can enjoy traditional Cretan dishes.

name: Orestis Hotel Apartments
description: Orestis Hotel Sea View Apartments are situated on the hillside in the picturesque village of Upper Stalos, 9 km from the center of Chania, 14 km from Souda harbour and 23 km from Chania airport. The hotel comprises of 2 buildings housing 12 apartments enjoying views of the sea and the mountains, a garden and a swimming pool. All apartments feature marble tiled floors, cream coloured walls and elegant furnishings. Each is equipped with air condition, kitchenette with fridge, living room with coffee table and sofa and terrace. Upper Stalos offers plenty of choices for food, shopping, daily excursions and entertainment. The nearest beaches are within walking distance. Other beaches like Agii Apostoli, Chrissi Akti, Platanias, Gerani are at a 5 to 10 minutes’ drive. Private and public parking are available at the hotel.

name: Esperides Beach Hotel Apartments
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Esperides Beach Hotel Apartments is located on the beach of Kato Stalos in Crete. It includes a garden, sun terrace and snack bar. Each air-conditioned apartment features free Wi-Fi, a TV with satellite channels and a seating area. The kitchenette includes a fridge and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Guests can relax at the snack bar or on the sun loungers offered by the pool. Alternatively, they can visit the city of Chania with the The Archeological Museum. Esperides Hotel Apartment is 20 km from Chania International Airport. The property offers free parking on site.

name: Manias Hotel Apartments
description: Situated in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias in the Crete region, with Agia Marina Beach and Stalos Beach nearby, Manias Hotel Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Offering a terrace or balcony with views of the sea and mountain, the units feature air conditioning, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV and kitchenette. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. Guests can enjoy the rooftop pool and garden at the aparthotel. Platanias Beach is 2.2 km from Manias Hotel Apartments, while Platanias Square is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International, 22 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Gianthea Studios and Apt
description: Situated 160 m from Stalos Beach, Gianthea Studios and Apt offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven. A fridge is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers an outdoor pool. Guests can also relax in the garden. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 22 km from Gianthea Studios and Apt.

name: Cretan Berry Kondylaki
description: Located in Chania Town, 1.3 km from Koum Kapi Beach, Cretan Berry Kondylaki features views of the city. The property is close to Municipal Art Gallery of Chania, Mitropoleos Square and Folklore Museum of Chania. The property is less than 1 km from Nea Chora Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is equipped with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms have a terrace and some have sea views. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Cretan Berry Kondylaki. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Cretan Berry Kondylaki include Kucuk Hasan Mosque, Chania Old Venetian Harbour and Saint Anargyri Church. The nearest airport is Chania International, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Despina Studios
description: Just 30 metres from the sandy beach of Agia Marina, Despina offers studios, some with views over the Cretan Sea. It has a swimming pool with sun terrace and it is very close to restaurants, beach bars and super markets. Each studio at the Despina comes with free air conditioning and well-equipped kitchenette. All units have microwave, cooking rings, fridge with freezer, as well as a dining area and private bathroom. Other facilities including hairdryer, safety box and satellite TV are free of charge. Guests may enjoy free Wi-Fi in all areas of the property. Luggage storage services are provided. The centre of the seaside resort of Platanias is 500 metres away. Chania International Airport is at 25 km and Souda Port is at 15 km. A bus stop is located just beside the property. Free on-site parking is possible.

name: Villas Michalis
description: Located in Chorafakia and surrounded by olive and pine trees, Michalis offers fully equipped sea-view villas with free Wi-Fi access. It has a pool and provides free private on-site parking. Guests at Villas Michalis enjoy a welcome basket with local products upon arrival. All units include a fully fitted kitchen with dining area and they are equipped with air conditioning and TV. Some villas enjoy direct access to the garden, while others have large verandas with views to the sea. Around the swimming pool of Villas Michalis guests can find sun beds and umbrellas, where they can relax and enjoy the sun. A separate pool for the children is also available. Within 500 metres there is a super market, while the sandy beach of Kalathas is less than a 10-minute walk away. The picturesque and bustling town of Chania is within 10 km from Michalis Villas.

name: Kriti Hotel
description: Less than a 20-minute walk from Anendyk Ferries, Kriti Hotel provides guests with a convenient base while in Chania. It also offers an express check-in and check-out feature, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. This modern hotel provides highchairs, a 24-hour reception and meeting rooms. There is free public parking nearby for those travelling with a car. After a day of sightseeing in the area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room closet, heating and a desk. Chania's attractions, such as the Eleftherios Venizelos Museum and the Archaeological Museum of Chania, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Kriti. There are also a variety of quality restaurants and bars close by.Revato

name: Hyperion City Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers 4-star accommodation in Chania Town and has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and shared lounge. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 300 metres from Koum Kapi Beach, less than 1 km from Saint Anargyri Church and a 12-minute walk from Archaeological Museum of Chania. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers some rooms with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hyperion City Hotel & Spa. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Greek, local and European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers a sun terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hyperion City Hotel & Spa include House-Museum of Eleftherios Venizelos, Municipal Art Gallery of Chania and Mitropoleos Square. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Golden Rose Suites
description: Just 250 metres from the beach, Golden Rose is located in Kolymbari Town. It features an outdoor swimming pool. All the units offer a terrace or balcony with garden or sea views. Modernly decorated, the spacious studios and apartments are air conditioned. They come with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and safety deposit box. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. A Continental breakfast is prepared daily and can be enjoyed in the privacy of your room. There is an on-site snack bar. Room service is available for a variety of coffees and drinks. Guests can sit back and relax on the sun loungers that surround the swimming pool. Wi-Fi is free in public areas of the property. The hotel staff can provide information on car rentals. Golden Rose is 19 km from Chania Town. Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 164 km. Various shops can be found 50 metres away.

name: Isla Brown Resort Chania, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Isla Brown Chania Resort & Spa, a member of Brown Hotels is an exclusive resort with beautiful views of the sea and great facilities. It is situated in the Chania prefecture, between Stavros and Tersanas. Chania Town is at a distance of 9 km. Chania Airport is 11 km away.

name: Areti Aparthotel
