description: Areti aparthotel is located in the picturesque village of Megala Chorafia, east of Chania, on Crete Island. It offers self-catering accommodation and has a swimming pool with poolside bar. It views the White Mountains to the south and the sea of Souda Bay to the north. Areti Aparthotel has a beautiful and quiet environment full of flowers, vineyards, olive trees and Cretan herbs. The family Aparthotel has been built from stone in traditional style, and offers authentic traditional furniture and decoration, also. All apartments have balconies or verandas overlooking the sea. There is a large fresh water pool with a bar, where guests may relax, while breakfast buffet is prepared daily with fruits and vegetables from the property's own garden. Local taverns with traditional cuisine and a large variety of local wines can be found near by. From here guests may explore the whole island. The closest beach is Kyani Akti of Kalyves at 4 km. Just 2 km away there is the ancient town of Aptera.

name: Divani Corfu Palace
description: Built among lush greenery in Kanoni Peninsula and just 3 km from the centre of Corfu Town, the 4-star Divani Corfu Palace features a swimming pool with hot tub. Breakfast is served on a terrace overlooking the bay. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Opening to a balcony with lagoon or garden views, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Divani Corfu Palace have modern furnishings in earthy colours. Each unit includes flat-screen TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units also have a separate lounge area. The main restaurant serves Greek and international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Featuring sunset views, the Laguna Pool Restaurant is ideal for snacks or drinks. A children’s pool and a playground are available for younger guests. A well-equipped fitness centre is also provided. Corfu International Airport is 2 km away and scenic Palaiokastritsa is at 25 km. Corfu Town with the Venetian Fortress is within a distance of 3 km, and Achilleion Palace is 5 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Corfu Holiday Palace Hotel
description: Situated in Kanoni, Corfu Holiday Palace is located within easy driving distance of Corfu and Perama. An indoor pool and outdoor tennis courts are just some of the luxurious amenities on offer to guests during their stay. The hotel has recently been refurbished and offers a ballroom, a sauna and a bowling alley. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out facility. The rooms at Corfu Holiday Palace are air-conditioned and include a telephone and an in-room closet. There are also multiple rooms especially designed for families. A satisfying breakfast is served every morning at Corfu Holiday Palace, and there are numerous restaurants and eateries close by. Room service is also offered during limited hours. Guests can set off on relaxed countryside walks or make use of Corfu Holiday Palace's bike rental service to explore the local area. Ideally located, the hotel is under a 10-minute car ride from Corfu International Airport.Revato

name: Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only
description: Situated in Gerani Chanion, 200 metres from Maleme Beach, Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a shared lounge, room service and free WiFi. The hotel provides an indoor pool, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. At Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Gerani Beach is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Platanias Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 28 km from Myrion Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only.

name: King Minos Retreat Resort & Spa
description: Perched amphitheatrically on the verdant hillside, KING MINOS RETREAT Resort & Spa, proud member of the GOLDEN Hotels & Resorts, enjoys unobstructed sea views. The charming 5-star hotel in Hersonissos consists of a main building with Classic Rooms and Suites as well as a number of bungalows with private pools and outdoor Jacuzzis, scattered throughout the colorful gardens. Built according to the Cretan style and architecture, KING MINOS RETREAT Resort & Spa offers a great array of facilities and services for everyone to enjoy, welcoming guests to experience the authentic essence of the renowned Cretan Philoxenia to the fullest.

name: Sunshine Studios
description: Located in Malia, 1.3 km from Central Malia Beach, Sunshine Studios provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a bar. The rooms come with a patio with garden views and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a stovetop, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Sunshine Studios features certain rooms with mountain views, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. With staff speaking Greek and English, guidance is available at the reception. Sun Beach is 1.8 km from Sunshine Studios, while Ikaros and Kernos Beach is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Sofia Hotel
description: Less than 5 minutes' bus ride from Heraklion centre in Crete, Sofia hotel offers a seasonal swimming pool and a seasonal restaurant. It serves breakfast and features rooms with free WiFi and a balcony. The fully refurbished rooms are light, spacious and are soundproofed. Each includes air conditioning, LCD satellite TV and fridge. Guests can relax by the outdoor pool, surrounded with sun loungers and enjoy a refreshing cocktail from the bar. A variety of restaurants can be found within 200 metres from the property. Heraklion is rich in Ottoman, Byzantine and Venetian architecture, as well as in Cretan restaurants and souvenir shops. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange car rental and free private parking is possible on site. Heraklion International Airport is just 1.5 km away.

name: Niros Beach
description: Located in Kokkíni Khánion, 100 metres from Gournes Beach, Niros Beachfront Aparthotel offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a year-round outdoor pool. Some of the units include a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. A bicycle rental service is available at Niros Beachfront Aparthotel, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kokkini Chani Beach, Themis Beach and Cretaquarium Thalassocosmos. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 9 km from Niros Beachfront Aparthotel.

name: Monastery Estate Venetian Harbor
description: No description found

name: Pela Mare Hotel
description: Pela Mare Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Gazi area. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like closet, towels, fireplace, separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, diving, pool (kids), garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Crete Island has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Pela Mare Hotel.Agoda

name: Glaros Beach Hotel
description: Glaros Beach Hotel is located in a quiet area of Chersonissos, next to the beach and only a few minutes’ walk from the centre. Each room is comfortably furnished and offers individual air conditioning, mini fridge, satellite TV and en suite bathroom with hairdryer. 18-hour room service is provided. In an idyllic atmosphere, overlooking the sea, in a romantic candlelight environment, Veranda Family Restaurant is the ideal place to enjoy the special dishes of creative Mediterranean and International Cuisine.

name: Elmi Suites Beach Hotel
description: Peacefully situated just 10 metres from the sandy beach, the seafront Elmi Suites Beach Hotel features 4 freshwater pools. Guests enjoy free access to the on-site gym and free WiFi. Modernly decorated, all suites at Elmi come complete with a hairdryer and satellite TV. Air conditioning comes standard. Buffet-style delicacies and dishes are served at the main restaurant throughout the day. Drinks and refreshments, as well as a lighter fare are available at the pool bar. Free sun loungers and umbrellas are available around the pool. Relaxing options such as a sauna, steam bath and hot tub, and massage rooms are provided upon charge. The multilingual reception staff are on hand 24/7, and will be happy to assist you with travel information and car or bike rentals. The lively centre of Hersonissos Town is 700 metres away and Malia Village is 7 km away. Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 27 km.

name: Nuovo Crete By Sea
description: Nuovo Crete By Sea features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Amoudara Herakliou. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a stovetop, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nuovo Crete By Sea each room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Amoudara Beach is 100 metres from Nuovo Crete By Sea, while Venetian Walls is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Arcus Suites
description: Arcus Suites is an entire neighbourhood of renovated Venetian stone mansions, located in the heart of the village of Argyroupolis in Rethymno. The suites have been renovated with respect to their original style and architecture. As a result, 5 independent suites were created. The decoration in each suites is unique and offers all modern 5-star comforts. The imposing dome, stone arches, stone fireplaces and wooden floors all create a unique atmosphere. The suites are located within a 400 m² garden, where guests can relax by the swimming pool and enjoy the beauty of the surrounding area. The beautiful beach of Episkopi is only 8 km away.

name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
description: Overlooking the Bay of Elounda, Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel is set on a peninsular stretch of land, with a view of Mirabello Bay and the Aegean Sea. It features elegantly decorated accommodation opening to a balcony or terrace with sea views. Offering a living room, all air-conditioned suites and villas come with a minibar. Some units are fitted with luxurious bathrooms with steam bath, while most have a private and individually heated pool. An American-style, a la carte breakfast can be enjoyed, whilst watching views of the bay. The awarded Calypso restaurant prepares gourmet dishes by the pool, while a selection of Greek and international wine labels are available at "Kellari" wine cellar. The "Koh" Pan-Asian restaurant, located just above sea level at the very tip of the peninsula, serves Asian cuisine. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool with free sun beds and umbrellas, paddling pool and care centre for children. A private sandy beach with beach service, as well as water-sport facilities and tennis courts are offered. A 50-seat cinema features private screenings of films. Located at the sister property, the exclusive Six Senses Spa is equipped with an authentic Turkish bath, where guests can experience holistic treatments and therapies. The seaside Agios Nikolaos Town is 10 km away and Heraklion City is at a distance of 70 km. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is 68 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Domes of Elounda,Autograph Collection
description: Overlooking turqoise waters with stunning views of the castle on Spinalonga Isle, Domes of Elounda, Suites and Villas - only, Luxury Resort captures the essence of Crete with an enchanting demeanour, finely tuned service and defining architecture. At night, our community gather at CORE, the open air, ancient Greek style agora, that blends pop-up shopping with street food, socializing, art and a unique lineup of events. Four restaurants with stellar ambience, fuse what’s local with what’s timeless to create what’s next. Montessori inspired Kids and Teen zones with fun filled activities, allow ample me time for parents to recharge in adult - only areas. Soma Spa offers renewal and outdoor connection through indigenous ritual. Βοοκ the Haute Living Selection for premium luxury, where all-inclusive becomes all exclusive. For those who seek tasteful, thoughtfully curated experiences Domes of Elounda Luxury Family Resort is ideal for bonding with loved ones and creating lifelong collective memories.Marriott

name: Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort
description: The 5-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort, Six Senses Spa is situated along the coast of Elounda. All rooms have views of Mirabello Bay. Guests can play golf or tennis on site, or relax at the awarded Six Senses Spa. The airy rooms have wooden floors and a sea-view veranda with teak furniture and blooming plants. Equipment includes an LDC TV with satellite and cable channels, and a furnished seating area. Porto Elounda offers the first Six Senses Spa™ in Europe, with holistic treatments, covering an area of 2,200 m². Facilities include a heated freshwater indoor pool, sauna and steam room. The 9-hole golf course is available to resort guests only. The hotel’s water sports centre includes jet-skis, wind surfing, water ski and sailing. Luxury yachts are available, as well as a PADI certified scuba diving centre. There is also a playground for infants and kids with a variety of learning activities. Breakfast and dinner are served at the sea-view Nafsika Restaurant. You can choose to have lunch at Aglio e Olio serving Italian cuisine, or the beachfront tavern Odysseus. The Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort is 70 km away from Heraklion International Airport. The hotel's helicopter-pad allows direct transfers from Athens or Heraklion. Transportation within the hotel is possible.

name: Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa
description: Nestled in lush green and offering a spectacular view of the Cretan Sea and the island of Agii Theodori, Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa features 3 restaurants, 5 bars and 5 large swimming pools. Built on a sublime area of 30,000 square metres, right next to the sea, the 5-star Porto Platanias boasts a health and fitness centre, pampering guests with an indoor heated pool, sauna, steam bath, hot tub and therapeutic massages. The elegant rooms at Porto Platanias meet the highest aesthetic standards. All rooms are fully equipped and have balcony with sea, pool or garden views. Porto Platanias Beach Resort is located in one of the most cosmopolitan areas of Crete, Platanias, 9km west of the city of Chania, and 20km from the Chania airport.

name: Atlantis Beach Hotel
description: This 5-star Rethymnon Beach hotel has a Blue Flag sandy beach, equipped with loungers and parasols. Atlantis Beach Hotel offers rooms with balconies, large gardens and a 170-m² swimming pool. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi, LCD satellite TV with 25 foreign channels and 1 Greek news channel, and a fridge. Their balconies offer sea or pool view. All rooms overlook the beautiful hotel gardens. Knossos restaurant serves Greek and Cretan cuisine. The lobby bar serves drinks in a beautiful atmosphere with views of the sea. Both the beach and the pool areas are serviced by the lobby and pool bars. The hotel offers free sun beds and umbrellas around the pools. Relaxing facilities at the Atlantis include a fitness room and a sauna. It also features a children’s playground and a games room. Atlantis Beach Hotel is located on the sandy beach of Rethymno, 1.5 km from the old town and the Venetian harbour. Private parking is available in hotel's garage with extra cost.

name: Capsis Astoria Heraklion Hotel
description: This well-known Capsis Astoria Heraklion is located next to the Archaeological Museum. It offers modern rooms with TFT TVs, and has a rooftop swimming pool that overlooks Heraklion and the old Venetian port. Each of the rooms has a private bathroom with tub, and self-regulated climate control. The walls are decorated with charming black and white photographs depicting the history of Heraklion. Erofilli Restaurant serves rich buffets for lunch and dinner. Greek breakfast is offered in the morning including homemade sweets and traditional products such as feta and mizithra cheese, olives and raisins. Boasting views of the Venetian Castle and the harbour, Aegean View Cocktail & Food Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Sin Bistro is open for lunch or dinner, and 24-hour room service is provided. Set within walking distance of the centre's main services, landmarks and nightlife, the Capsis Astoria Heraklion can also facilitate conferences and social gatherings. Guests also benefit from free early check-in and late check-out. N. Kazantzakis Airport is only 5 km away. Right outside the hotel entrance, a frequent bus service is available to beaches and various places of interest.

name: Senseana Sea Side Resort & Aquadventure
description: When searching for family hotels in Crete, Greece, think of SENSEANA Seaside Resort & Spa: joyful in its relaxed ambiance, welcoming in its facilities for one and all, and homely in its haven-like nature. Younger travelers will delight in the host of dedicated children's facilities available, aspiring to be the best amongst Crete family hotels.

name: Bella Beach Hotel
description: Lying on the sandy beach of Anissaras, the 5-star Bella Beach offers elegant accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea or the complex’s well-kept gardens. It includes 2 swimming pools, 2 restaurants and offers extended wellness facilities. The air-conditioned rooms at Bella Beach are decorated in light olive-green tones and open out to a private balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player, mini fridge, free toiletries and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available and safety boxes are provided upon charge. Pergola Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet style, while Olive Tree Restaurant prepares Mediterranean dishes a la carte. The 3 bars, on the lobby, the beach and by the pool, are ideal for enjoying an exotic cocktail while overlooking the sea. Guests can pamper themselves at the on-site spa centre including an indoor pool, a hot tub and a hammam. The property also features a variety of sports facilities, such as 2 tennis courts, a mini-golf course and a basketball court. The lively town of Hersonissos with its many nightlife options is around 4 km from the resort. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at 25 km. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Mandy Suites
description: Mandy Suites lies in the centre of Kissamos, 5 metres from the sea. It offers a bar, swimming pool and modern accommodation with garden, pool or sea views. All of the studios and apartments at Mandy Suites feature private bathrooms and kitchenettes with fridge. Each has a TV, while air conditioning is available upon surcharge. Guests can enjoy relaxing moments under the Cretan sun, at the hotel’s sun terrace. Free sun beds and umbrellas are provided at the on-site pool. The recently renovated Mandy Suites benefit from free parking facilities and free Wi-Fi throughout.

name: Koutrakis Suites by Estia
description: Located in Sissi, Koutrakis Suites by Estia offers accommodation with a shared swimming pool. All suites come with a living area and flat-screen, satellite TV. A mini fridge, electric kettle and minibar are also provided. There is room service at the property. Heraklio Town is 45 km from Koutrakis Suites by Estia, while Hersonissos is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: Theo Star Beach Hotel
description: Situated just a few metres from the beach of Malia, Theodosis Apartments offers self-catering accommodation with views to the large garden and the Cretan Sea. Studios and apartments in Theodosis are spacious and tastefully furnished. Each unit comes with a kitchen or kitchenette with dining area. Facilities include a TV, air conditioning and safe. All rooms also have a balcony. The bustling town of Hersonissos offering many dining and nightlife options is 10 km away. Theodosis offers free Wi-Fi in its public areas and free private parking on site.

name: Rethymno Mare Royal & Water Park
description: Just a few metres from Skaleta Beach, Rethymno Mare Royal features a pool with a sun terrace, a bar and a restaurant. Covering a lush 35.000-m2 area, the property also includes a tennis court, a mini market, 2 coference rooms and a games room with billiards. All rooms and suites of Mare Royal open to a balcony overlooking the pool and the Cretan Sea. Fitted with marbled floors and warm colours, each air-conditioned unit features a fridge, a safe and a Samsung Smart IP TV 43". The private bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast with local specialities served daily at Dionysos Restaurant. Drinks and coffees can be enjoyed at the pool bar or the beach bar, while Mediterranean flavours are served at the restaurant. Themed nights with live music are also scheduled regularly. Children can swim safely in their own pool, while there is also animation program, kids’ buffet and a mini club. Sun beds and umbrellas are available by the pool and on the beach. Other facilities include table tennis, darts, volleyball, water polo, boccia. Massage treatments can be arranged upon request, while room service is also available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide car rental and ticket services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Rethymno Mare Royal lies within 11 km from Rethymno Town and Port and 65 km from Heraklion City. The seaside Bali Village with its sandy beach is at 21 km. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Lazar Lux Suites - Ammoudara
address: Ethniki Odos Agiou Nikolaou Sitias, Agios Nikolaos 721 00
description: Set 200 metres from Ammoudara Beach, Lazar Lux Suites - Ammoudara offers an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. At Lazar Lux Suites - Ammoudara guests are welcome to take advantage of beauty services. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Lazar Lux Suites - Ammoudara, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Cave Thief Beach is 1.2 km from the aparthotel, while Almiros Beach is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International, 60 km from Lazar Lux Suites - Ammoudara, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Eliathos Residence Houses
description: Surrounded by beautiful Cretan countryside just 1 km from Archanes, Eliathos Residence offers well-appointed self-catering units with home comforts, including free wireless internet. Eliathos Residence Houses comprises of 4 villas, which are divided into houses, luxury apartments and studios. Each of the spaces offers the comforts of home with the professional services and personal attention of a hotel. Prepare meals in your fully equipped kitchen. Sit outside on your private veranda and admire the beautiful natural landscape surrounding Eliathos Residence. Eliathos Residence can organise tours and activities according to your personal interests. Join in with seasonal activities including grape gathering, wine making, olive oil producing and raki making. Go horse-riding with the horses from Eliathos’ nearby farm. Enjoy traditional Cretan cooking demonstrations. Visit the monuments and archaeological sites of Archanes, Knossos and Heraklion.

name: Drossia Palms Hotel and Nisos Beach Suites
description: Drossia Palms Hotel and Nisos Beach Suites is a beautiful complex set amidst delightful gardens with palm trees and located 150 metres from the Malia beach. It consists of 2 separate buildings and features a private beach area with sun loungers and umbrellas. Facilities include a snack bar, pool table and large swimming pool area with sun terrace. The rooms are spacious and tastefully decorated. They all have private balconies overlooking the complex, air conditioning and kitchenette facilities. With a location right next to Malia's entertainment district and central beach strip, Drossia Palms Hotel and Nisos Beach Suites allows you to enjoy this vibrant seaside resort. Staff can also arrange excursions on request.

name: Palazzo Vecchio Exclusive Residence
address: Iroon Politechniou, Ioannou Melissinou &, Rethymno 741, Rethymno
description: Built in the 15th century, the Palazzo Vecchio Exclusive Residence is an authentic Venetian mansion and one of the oldest of Rethymnon. It is situated in a quiet location, below the Venetian Fortress and just 50 metres from the sea. Restored with taste and respect to the local history and aesthetics, the Palazzo Vecchio offers luxurious suites, junior suites and maisonettes. Featuring Coco-Mat beds and mattresses, all units include free WiFi. The formation of the internal areas, the furnishings, the cobbled courtyard and the small pool all fully accord with the aesthetic commands of the same artistic tradition. Guests will find restaurants, café-bars and shops all within a short walking distance from Palazzo Vecchio Exclusive Residence. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mitos Village
description: Set in Hersonissos, Mitos Village provides a restaurant. Free WiFi is provided. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with sea views. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Mitos Village offers an outdoor pool. A garden and a terrace are featured at the property. Water City is 2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Golden Beach Hotel
description: This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Located in Hersonissos, just steps from a sandy beach, a lounge bar and a mini market. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access and a balcony and provides a 24-hour front desk. Fitted with tiled floors, soft colours and modern furnishings, the rooms at Golden Beach are equipped with a safe, a flat-screen satellite TV and a fridge. Each includes a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Some units offer views over the Cretan Sea. Breakfast can be enjoyed daily at the hotel's main, sea-view restaurant, where lunch and dinner are also served. Hersonissos town centre is just 500 metres from Golden Beach, with plenty of tourist attractions and nightlife. The centre of Heraklion is 30 km away, while Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at a distance of 28 km.

name: Dedalos Hotel
description: Set in Malia, less than 1 km from Central Malia Beach, Dedalos Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a garden view. Each room comes with a safety deposit box and certain rooms also offer pool views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Speaking German, Greek, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Ikaros and Kernos Beach is 2 km from Dedalos Hotel, while Alexander Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International, 29 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sunny Bay Hotel
description: On the beachfront of Kissamos, Sunny Bay Hotel Hotel offers accommodation with sea or pool views, traditional Cretan cuisine and free WiFi throughout. Kissamos centre is just a short stroll away. Sunny Bay Hotel’s restaurant serves an extensive buffet of local and international dishes during breakfast and dinner. The indoor and pool bars are perfect for drinks. Staff can provide beach umbrellas or arrange bicycle rental. Sunny Bay Hotel features a games area with table tennis and billiards. An on-site store is available for necessities. Each air-conditioned room includes a private balcony with outdoor seating area. Rooms also feature satellite TVs and well-stocked mini bars. Famous Falassarna beach is just 15 km away and the archaeological site of Polyrinia is only a 10-minute drive. Chania Airport is 50 km away.

name: Almyrida Resort
description: Centrally located in Almyrida Town and by the beach, The Almyrida Resort consists of four hotels, the Almyrida Beach Hotel, the Almyrida Residence Hotel, the Almyrida Studios Hotel and the Almyrida Gardens. In our premises you can find 4 outdoor pools, a fitness center, a spa, an infinity adults only pool in our Roof Garden. All rooms offer a balcony with view either to the Sea, or to the mountains. Certified Greek breakfast is served in the morning. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, the units come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV, mini fridge and safety deposit box. Some include a spa bath, separate rooms, or DVD player. Greek breakfast at Almyrida Resort includes among others local delicacies. The on-site bar offers beverages, cocktails, ice creams and snacks. The à la carte Restaurant Thea serves Cretan and European fine dinining dishes on the rooftop garden. Various restaurants, cafés and a beach are close to the Almyrida. It is 25 km from Chania city and 30 km from Chania Airport.

name: I Resort Beach Hotel & Spa
description: Situated right on the sandy beach of Stalida, the 5-star I- Resort Beach Hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms. It includes a spa centre and 2 restaurants. The air-conditioned rooms of I- Resort Beach Hotel Lounge feature parquet floors and light wood furnishings. They come with a satellite LCD TV, minibar and hairdryer. All rooms have balconies, while most of them enjoy Cretan Sea views. The 2 pools have wooden decks with free sun loungers and umbrellas. Facilities include 2 restaurants, as well as 2 bars, the main and the pool bar. I- Resort Beach Hotel is a few minutes’ walk from the centre of Stalida. Heraklion airport is at 35 km. Free private on-site parking is available. There is no ATM on the property but nearby.

name: Aegean Sky Hotel & Suites
description: Aegean Sky is a brand new hotel complex offering modern and spacious studios and apartments within walking distance of the beach in Malia, Crete’s premier party resort. The accommodation at Aegean Sky Hotel - Suites is comfortable and functional. All the units have balconies or patios, as well as indoor seating areas. The extensive list of in-room facilities includes air conditioning, satellite TV, minibar and CD player. Without even stepping out of Aegean Sky Hotel - Suites, you can enjoy Greek cuisine at the restaurant or have fun with a drink and a bite at the poolside bar. And when you are ready to go out, everything Malia has to offer – from the sandy beach and the old village, to its famous nightlife – is right on your doorstep.

name: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa
description: Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa features a restaurant, seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Elounda. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers car hire and features a garden and sun terrace. Guests at the resort can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests at Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa will be able to enjoy activities in and around Elounda, like cycling. Plaka Beach is 300 metres from the accommodation, while Spinalonga is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Sitia Public Airport, 36 km from Cayo Exclusive Resort & Spa.

name: Kallicrates Village
description: In a most scenic location, enjoying the background of the Lefka Ori and the Libyan Sea, Kallicrates Village is located at Fragokastello, 11 km east of Sfakia, at the southern coast of Crete. Wi-Fi is free and available throughout. Kallicrates Village offers 10 studios. All are simply furnished, spacious and airy and surrounded by large garden areas. Guests can have breakfast at the pool bar. Refreshments and drinks are available at the rooftop terrace, which offers beautiful views.

name: Pleasure Beach Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Pleasure Beach Hotel offers accommodation in Mália. Free private parking is available on site. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Certain units have views of the sea or garden. All rooms have a private bathroom. There is a shared lounge, a tour desk, luggage storage space and hairdresser's at the property. Heraklio Town is 30 km from Pleasure Beach Hotel, while Hersonissos is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Kallitsakis Beach
description: Situated 200 metres from Platanias Beach, Kallitsakis Beach offers an infinity pool, a garden and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some rooms feature a terrace or a patio. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel guests are welcome to take advantage of a public bath. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Kallitsakis Beach, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Agia Marina Beach, Platanias Square and Agios Dimitrios Church. The nearest airport is Chania International, 24 km from Kallitsakis Beach, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sapphire Horizon Suites
description: Sapphire Horizon Suites has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a snack bar and shared lounge in Kissamos. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers car hire and features a garden and terrace. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Mavros Molos Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Kissamos / Kasteli Port is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International, 44 km from Sapphire Horizon Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ledra Maleme Hotel
description: Just 150 metres from the beach, the traditionally built Ledra Maleme Hotel offers a swimming pool, poolside bar and Cretan restaurant. It features air-conditioned studios with free Wi-Fi and views of the sea or the garden. Studios at Ledra Maleme Hotel feature a kitchenette with cooking facilities, fridge and a coffee machine. Each unit has a flat-screen TV. Some of the studios have a balcony. Kids can play in the children's pool or have fun in the playground. Table tennis facilities are also provided. Platanias is just a 5-minute drive away. Souda Airport is located 26 km away. The property offers free private parking.

name: Ionia Suites
description: Located 100 metres from the beach of Rethymno, Ionia Suites offers a swimming pool on the terrace and sun terrace with umbrellas and sun loungers. It features elegant accommodation with cooking facilities and free WiFi. Decorated in neutral colours, with classical furnishings and modern details, all accommodation types at the Ionia Suites feature air conditioning and a TV. They are also fitted with hypoallergic COCO-MAT mattresses and pillows. There is a well-equipped kitchen with a microwave and a refrigerator. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Lunch and dinner can be provided on request. Guests can also ask for yoga lessons and beauty treatments. The Old Town of Rethymno with the Venetian Harbour is 250 metres away. Restaurants and cafes are within 100 metres. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange tickets and offer information on the surroundings. The municipal parking is 100 metres away.

name: Liza Mary Hotel
description: Just 50 metres from the beach, in Bali, Resol Liza Mary Hotel features a free-form pool, buffet style restaurant and a bar. It offers air-conditioned rooms with sea or pool views. Rooms at Lisa Mari open out to a private balcony and come with a satellite TV with international channels, and a refrigerator. Each room also has its own bathroom with bathtub or shower, and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy Greek and international dishes for lunch and dinner. Light snacks and drinks are served at the bar featuring a large, flat-screen TV. The nearest bus stop is 800 metres away from the hotel. The town of Rethymno is 30 km away, while Heraklion City and Airport is at 50 km. Free private, on-site parking is possible.

name: Aquila Porto Rethymno
description: Located on the sandy beach of Rethymno and within a short walk from the Old Town, Aquila Porto Rethymno features 3 freshwater pools, a private beach and 2 restaurants. The hotel complex offers a variety of sports and leisure activities, such as massage treatments and yoga lessons. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and earthy colours, the rooms of Aquila overlook the Cretan Sea or the town from their balcony. Each unit is equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and a mini bar. The luxurious bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a continental or an American buffet breakfast. Cretan, Mediterranean and International flavours are prepared at the Piazza Di Porto Restaurant and at the main restaurant for lunch or dinner. Drinks and exotic cocktails can be enjoyed at the poolside snack bar. A welcome drink, and a welcome pack with wine and water, are offered upon arrival. A variety of happenings, such as dance shows and cooking lessons, are organized. Younger guests can also enjoy themselves playing games and taking part at competitions at the on-site fun club. Guests can also benefit from the free use of the gym and sauna, as well as sunbeds and umbrellas. Aquila Porto Rethymno is situated 600 metres from Rethymnon Port and 61 km from Chania International Airport. Heraklion International Airport is at 84 km, while Heraklion Town and Port is at 80 km.

name: Kyma Suites Beach Hotel
description: Providing a privileged position near the vicinity’s attractions, this small but beautiful hotel features a special architectural structure and is conveniently located in the centre of Rethymnon, by the beach. Sun loungers and umbrellas are provided on the beach. The strategic situation of this modern hotel offers guests the opportunity of spending wonderful holidays which combine swimming, water sports, shopping in the town and night life without having to use any means of transportation as everything is within walking distance. A bottle of wine is offered upon arrival. Despite the urban environment, the hotel provides a stunning terrace that features a view of the sea where you can enjoy a drink or something to eat. There is also a relaxed restaurant, bar and an outlook of the sea from the rooms. This hotel will make for the perfect base for a stay on the literally wonderful island of Crete.

name: Alianthos Garden
description: Alianthos Garden Hotel is a family-run complex, situated just 50 metres opposite the wonderful beach of Plakias, in Rethymno area. It offers free Wi-Fi access and free private on-site parking. Located just few minutes’ walk from the shops and tavernas of the village, the overall tone at the Alianthos Hotel is informal and truly perfect for relaxing. The renovated guest rooms and apartments of Hotel Alianthos Garden are well-equipped and offer comfortable beds with orthosomatic mattresses by Cocomat as well as a pillow menu. They all feature balconies with panoramic views of the surrounding area. Guests at the Alianthos Garden Hotel may enjoy exotic cocktails at the bar, or the sun by the large fresh water swimming pool.

name: Sensus Experience by Lavris
description: Located in Gouves, less than 1 km from Marina Beach, Sensus Experience by Lavris provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a kids' club and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Sensus Experience by Lavris each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Sensus Experience by Lavris offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkelling and cycling. Languages spoken at the reception include German, Greek, English and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Gournon Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Gouves Beach is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 13 km from Sensus Experience by Lavris.

name: Chc Marilena Hotel
description: Within 120 metres from the beach of Amoudara, the 4-star CHC Marilena Hotel has a large swimming pool, a restaurant and a poolside bar and offers elegant accommodation with Cretan Sea or mountain views. The air-conditioned Marilena rooms are decorated in light tones and open out to a balcony or terrace. Each comes with a satellite TV and mini fridge, while in the private bathroom you can find a hairdryer. Guests can spend relaxing moments in the palm-tree garden of Marilena featuring sun beds and umbrellas, while sports and leisure facilities include a table-tennis table and billiards. Traditional Cretan and international dishes are prepared at the on-site restaurant. Throughout the day, guests can also enjoy refreshing drinks, fresh juices, coffees and light snacks at the covered area by the swimming pool. The city centre of Heraklion is 5 km away, and Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at 11 km. Within 14 km, you can also visit the village of Agia Pelagia with its sandy beach and many seaside taverns. Free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking are provided.

name: Blue Villas
address: Kapodistriou 2 Agia Marina Chania Crete, Chania 731 00
description: Set in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, 300 metres from Stalos Beach, Blue Villas offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a patio and access to a garden and a year-round outdoor pool. The holiday home provides guests with a balcony, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At Blue Villas guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. Agia Marina Beach is 700 metres from the accommodation, while Platanias Square is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chania International, 21 km from Blue Villas, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Villa Iokasti
description: Situated in the picturesque village of Koutouloufari, Villa Iokasti provides traditional accommodation with plenty of entertainment facilities, free wireless internet and warm Cretan hospitality. Relax around the large outdoor swimming pool and enjoy the Mediterranean sun.There are many entertainment options at Villa Iokasti. A full English or Continental Breakfast is served daily. Savour the wonderful flavours of traditional Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel even provides cooking lessons on request. Taste the magnificent Greek wine, or have a dance at one of the hotel’s theme nights. The hotel enjoys a peaceful location, close to many places of cultural interest. A short stroll will take you into the traditional village or to the beach. The hotel can also arrange for you to rent a car or bike, so you can easily explore the surrounding area.

name: Mitsis Petit Palais Beach Hotel
description: Providing an outdoor pool, Mitsis Petit Palais Beach Hotel is situated in Rhodes City and is a brief stroll from Elli Beach. It also offers a sun deck, free Wi-Fi and highchairs. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. For those travelling with children Mitsis Petit Palais Beach Hotel offers babysitting/child services. The rooms at the hotel are air-conditioned and include a refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities and slippers. They feature an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and an in-room closet. During their stay, guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Main Restaurant, which offers Greek and international specialties. A selection of cafés and restaurants are also found in close proximity to the property. Mitsis Petit Palais Beach Hotel is situated amongst the area's well-known tourist attractions, including Colossus of Rhodes, Palace of the Grand Master of the Knights of Rhodes and Mandraki Port, which are within walking distance. For those sightseeing in the area, the hotel provides packed lunches.Revato

name: Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel
description: This beachfront hotel enjoys a privileged location, just a 15-minute walk outside Rhodes’ Old Town. Guests enjoy 3 swimming pools, sports facilities and luxurious rooms with sea or garden views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel’s rooms are air conditioned and feature a spacious bathroom with bathtub and satellite TV with international channels. They are decorated in warm colours and feature elegant wooden furniture. Most rooms offer a breathtaking view over the sea. Guests of the Mitsis Grand Hotel Beach Hotel can enjoy the 2 outdoor sea-water swimming pools and the pebbled beach in front of the hotel. Sun beds & umbrellas are at the guests' disposal by the pool. A bridge room, fitness centre, as well as a floodlit tennis court are available. More exciting activities, such as windsurfing, and catamaran sailing are available at the nearby water-sports centre. The Grand’s dining pallet includes a Chinese, a Greek, a Mexican and an Italian restaurant. There is also a restaurant serving a great variety of juicy burgers. Crepes and ice creams can be enjoyed at the on-site creperie-gelateria, while delicious pizzas are served at the Pizza Oven. Fine cuisine is proposed at the hotel's buffet restaurant. Refreshments and cocktails can be enjoyed at the main bar and at the pool bar.

name: In Camera Art Boutique Hotel
description: Featuring impressive elements of architecture, design and decoration, In Camera Art Boutique Hotel lies in Rhodes Old Town. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. The property is located 500 metres from the medieval castle, part of UNESCO World Heritage. Stone-built walls, arches, beamed ceilings, ornamented tiles are only a few of the features uniquely blended in all suites and the villa at In Camera. They are decorated with unique art photos and cameras and offer COCO-MAT mattresses, and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. They all come with a view to the Medieval Town. An outdoor hot tub with hydromassage jets is offered upon availability. Facilities include a bar and garden. An array of nearby attractions include Synagogue Kahal Shalom, Governor's Palace and Yeni Hamam, all found within approximately 1 km. Several taverns, restaurants, a supermarket and shops are available within walking distance. The port of Rhodes is about 1 km away, while Diagoras International Airport is at a distance of 15 km. The Grand Master's Palace lies within a walking distance.

name: D'Argento Boutique Rooms
description: 1.8 km from Akti Kanari Beach, D'Argento Boutique Rooms is situated in Rhodes Town and features free WiFi, concierge services and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 2.2 km from Zefyros Beach, less than 1 km from Mandraki Port and a 12-minute walk from Deer Statues. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 1.3 km from Elli Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At D'Argento Boutique Rooms rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Mediterranean and Grill Bbq cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested. Popular points of interest near D'Argento Boutique Rooms include The Street of Knights, Clock Tower and Grand Master's Palace. The nearest airport is Rhodes International, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Avalon Boutique Suites Hotel
description: Avalon Boutique Hotel is situated in the heart of the Old Town, by the Grand Masters' Palace on the Street of the Knights. The Archaeological Museum is right next. Transformed from a period building, maintaning its original architectural and historical features, the Avalon Boutique Hotel is in keeping with the atmosphere and mystery surrounding this Medieval city. All suites are luxuriously furnished and feature modern amenities such as minibar, heating and air conditioning. All feature a bathroom with spa bath and a balcony with views of the city and the port or Medieval courtyard. Within walking distance from the hotel, is the historical buildings of Mandraki, the marina, the majestic church of Panagia tou Kastrou and the old town entrances with their impressive fountains. Avalon Boutique Hotel is only 800 metres from the port and 13 kilometres from the airport. Guests are offered transfer to and from the port.

name: Aquamare City And Beach
description: Situated in Rhodes town, right across Rhodes Casino and only 100 metres from Elli beach, AQUAMARE CITY and BEACH offers rooms with balcony. It serves buffet breakfast and it has a swimming pool. Free WiFi is available throughout. AQUAMARE CITY and BEACH rooms are bright and airy, and enjoy views of the pool or the Aegean Sea from their balconies. They are equipped with air conditioning, TV and refrigerator. Around the pool guests can find sun beds, where they can relax with a drink or a snack from the pool bar. Inside the hotel there is also a bar. A pizza restaurant is also featured on site. A boutique shop with decorative items, as well as a selection of men and women clothing, is also available. Aquamare features a Finnish sauna. Sports facilities, such as tennis courts and the nautical club can be found within walking distance. Rhodes Medieval Town is a 10-minute walk away. Free public parking is possible nearby.

name: Oktober Downtown Boutique Hotel
description: Oktober Downtown Boutique Hotel enjoys a prime location in the centre of Rhodes town, just metres away from the Medieval town, the beach and Rhodes Casino. It offers tasteful accommodation, a swimming pool and a stylish lobby bar. Modernly decorated, Oktober Downtown Boutique Hotel are air conditioned and have a balcony with views to the town or the pool. Each comes with a TV and a private bathroom with shower. There is also a lounge bar where guests can enjoy a drink, cocktail or a quick snack in a stylish setting. Rhodes Airport is 13 km away from Oktober Downtown Boutique Hotel. The town of Faliraki, famous for its nightlife, is within a 20-minute drive.

name: Dionysos Hotel
description: Dionysos Hotel is set in a blooming tropical garden, amongst pine and olive trees, with bars and restaurants surrounding its water lake pool. Loungers and umbrellas are complimentary. Ixia Beach is 200 metres from the hotel. Accommodation at Hotel Dionysos is spacious and air-conditioned and includes en suite bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer. Each room offers a balcony or terrace with view of the sea or the gardens and pool. The enriched American breakfast buffet includes on-spot cooking stations. Mediterranean and Greek dishes are served at the main and poolside restaurant. There is also a Souvlaki - Kebab corner, a Creperie and a pastry shop. Children are entertained at the children’s pool and the playground. Greek evenings with live music and shows are frequently hosted. Free WiFi is provided in all areas. Rhodes Town is 3.6 km from Dionysos Hotel. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 10 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mitsis La Vita Beach Hotel
description: This modern hotel in Rhodes City provides complimentary wireless internet, as well as a coffee bar and a swimming pool. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Mitsis La Vita Beach Hotel features an all-hours reception, as well as luggage storage and babysitting/child services. For added convenience, it offers a terrace, a safe and a car rental desk. Those staying at Mitsis La Vita Beach Hotel can relax in their luxurious rooms that provide tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a seating area. Breakfast is prepared every day at Main Restaurant, specialising in international and local cuisine. In the evening, guests can wind down in the lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options are also available in close proximity to the property. Mitsis La Vita Beach Hotel is conveniently situated for exploring Rhodes City with Aquarium of Rhodes within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit Colossus of Rhodes, Mandraki Port and Palace of the Grand Master of the Knights of Rhodes.Revato

name: Rodos Niohori Elite Suites
description: Rodos Niohori Elite Suites Boutique Hotel is set in a traditional house, a 5-minute walk from the Rhodes Casino. It offers luxurious suites with 2 satellite LCD TVs, and a pebbled breakfast courtyard. Each Niohori two-storey suite is fitted with Italian furnishings and a touch of Italian décor. They all have a private terrace with sun loungers and an umbrella. A dining table for 4, a seating room and 2 bathrooms are featured. Rodos Niohori Elite Suites serves a homemade breakfast, including fresh fruit, at the communal courtyard. Free WiFi access is offered throughout. Rhodes’ nearest sandy beach is 300 metres from the suites. The lodging is easily reachable from Diagoras International Airport, 14 km away. The medieval town of Rhodes is 1 km away, while bars, clubs and restaurants are within 150 metres away. Elli Beach and the Aquarium are within proximity.

name: Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa
description: Providing free WiFi, Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa is located in Ixia. The hotel provides a spa experience, with its hot tub, sauna and fitness centre. Guests can make use of a private beach area. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms come with a private bathroom, free toiletries and a balcony. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa rooms come with a seating area. The accommodation offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa you will find Asian Restaurant. The hotel offers 4 outdoor swimming pools. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel. With staff speaking German, English and French, round-the-clock guidance is available at the reception. Rhodes Town is 4 km from Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa, while Faliraki is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Kastelli Hotel
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Afandou village in Rhodes, Kastelli Hotel, Afandou offers a swimming pool, a snack bar and daily breakfast. Afandou Beach is 2 km away. Rooms at Hotel Kastelli include a private balcony. Each has a private bathroom with shower and amenities. There are lots of free sun loungers and umbrellas in the pool area. The pool bar serves drinks and snacks until late in the evening. Special meals, such as traditional Greek dishes, can be provided upon request. Nearby Afanou Beach has water sports facilities such as windsurfing. The Old Town of Rhodes is at 18 km and Rhodes International Airport is 23 km away. Staff at the tour desk can arrange car rental and free private parking is available on site.

name: Kouros Stone Suites
description: No description found

name: Belair Beach Hotel
description: Just steps away from the beach on the bay of Ixia, Belair Beach Hotel provides a family-friendly atmosphere with a variety of leisure activities and close to the local tavernas. Belair Beach Hotel enjoys a prime location in Ixia, close to the beautiful beach and main attractions. Combining modern amenities with a relaxed family atmosphere, Belair Beach is an ideal base for families and couples. Benefit from a complimentary buffet breakfast every day and free private parking during your stay. Relax by the spacious outdoor pool or enjoy a game of tennis or mini golf in Belair Hotel’s garden. Just across the road from Belair Beach, you can find plenty of water sport activities, including windsurfing and jet skiing. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants surrounding Belair Beach Hotel.

name: Rodos Palace Hotel
description: Set in a wonderful Aegean setting, the luxurious Rodos Palace offers a wide variety of suites and exceptionally stylish accommodation, and boasts 5 outdoor pools, and 4 restaurants, bar and lounges. Spread around the resort, there are 14 picturesque blocks with garden suites. They are spacious, superbly designed and are ideal for couples and families looking for privacy and a series of exclusive facilities, including private pools. Each unit has free WiFi access and is equipped with a Smart TV with satellite channels. On the top floors of the 20-storey Tower, the redesigned rooms and suites are uniquely decorated and come with modern amenities. Next to the Rodos Palace Hotel Tower, you will find the Executive VIP Wing. They both offer accommodation that combines stylish décor, state-of-the-art equipment and beautiful sea views. Rodos Palace guests enjoy a great array of dining options, including both indoor and outdoor restaurants serving excellent Greek and European cuisine. Within a short distance of the resort, you can enjoy activities such as horse riding, golf in an 18-hole championship court and yachting. A variety of experiences has been organised in packages for guests who wish to further explore the island. A beach accessible to people with mobility issues is just 50 metres away. Rodos Palace is only 500 metres from the long, sandy Ialyssos beach, with the perfectly preserved Rhodes Old Town only a short drive away.

name: Sperveri Boutique Hotel
description: Located in Rhodes Town, 400 metres from Akti Kanari Beach, Sperveri Boutique Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room includes a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Sperveri Boutique Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Italian and vegetarian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rhodes Town, like cycling. Popular points of interest near Sperveri Boutique Hotel include Elli Beach, Mandraki Port and Deer Statues. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: 7Palms
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a stone-paved terrace, 7Palms is quietly located outside the touristic part of Rhodes and at the same time within walking distance of the Medieval City of Rhodes. It offers spacious studios and apartments with free WiFi and a private balcony. The city centre of Rhodes is 1.5 km away. Fitted with parquet floors, dark-wooden furnishings and some antique items, each air-conditioned, self-catering unit of 7Palms provides a well-equipped kitchen and 1 or 2 separate bedrooms. The accommodation is finished with a spacious and modern bathroom. Just a short walk from 7 Palms, guests can reach the city's important sites, such as the ancient stadium and the Temple of Apollo. A variety of restaurants, shops and cafes can be found within walking distance. Diagoras International Airport is 20 km away.

name: Parthenon Hotel
description: Situated only 100 metres from Psaropoula Beach, and a 5-minute walk from Rhodes’ old town, Hotel Parthenon Rodos city offers sea views and a relaxing outdoor pool area, close to all the action. All air-conditioned guest rooms feature a private balcony, and each comes with a fridge and a safe. A hairdryer is included in the bathroom. A varied Continental breakfast is served every day and includes various cereals, croissants, cake and fruit. The café bar serves coffee and cakes, as well as drinks and light snacks. Sun beds, chairs and tables are available around the pool, where guests can enjoy soft drinks, exotic cocktails, or snacks. There is also an internet café within the premises. Hotel Parthenon Rodos city is 5 minutes’ walk from Rhodes’ Medieval Town and close to the commercial centre of the city and the casino.

name: Bellevue On The Beach Suites
description: Featuring a restaurant, Bellevue On The Beach Suites are on the beach of Rhodes City. They offer elegant accommodation with walk-in shower. Facilities include 2 pools and a snack bar. Offering Aegean Sea views, all air-conditioned units at Bellevue have free high-speed WiFi. Each comes with a seating area with Smart flat-screen TV. Some accommodation types feature a kitchenette with Nespresso coffee machine. Guests may start their day with a breakfast served at the on-site restaurant or enjoy dishes created by an awarded chef. Refreshing cocktails and light meals are prepared at the snack bar. Several restaurants and shops are available within short walking distance. The Medieval City of Rhodes is approximately 2 km away. Rhodes International Airport is at a distance of 14 km.

name: Manousos City Hotel
description: This central hotel offers comfortable accommodation and a friendly atmosphere, within walking distance of Rhodes' main attractions. The rooms at Manousos City Hotel are tastefully decorated and well-appointed with air conditioning and satellite TV. All rooms offer free Wi-Fi access. Enjoy our rich buffet breakfast. Manousos City Hotel also has an outdoor swimming pool with a pool bar and 24-hours front desk. The beach is just 100 metres from Manousos City Hotel and there are plenty of bars around the corner. The medieval Rhodes Town is at 1 km and Rhodes International Airport is 14 km away. Street parking is possible upon availability.

name: Sheraton Rhodes Resort
description: Rhodes, a city with a 2400 year history, the place that gave birth to legends and hosted significant personalities of politics, the arts and culture, with a beauty that enthralled its conquerors through the centuries, hosts the welcoming Sheraton Rhodes Resort. Our 5-star hotel is cocooned in the beauty of its attractive lush gardens with the blue expanse of the pristine waters in front of its private beach, is ideally situated in a key spot in Ixia, just 4 kilometres from the famous Medieval Town of Rhodes, the best preserved Medieval City in the world and an UNESCO World Heritage Monument. Our family friendly resort encompasses in its grounds and services the very things that Rhodes offers natural beauty, unique architecture, a variety of entertainment options, modern infrastructure and traditional hospitality.Marriott

name: Comfort Hotel Apartments
description: Comfort Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Rhodes City area. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Comfort Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Comfort Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Rhodes or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Villa Sanyan - Adults Only
description: Featuring a garden, Villa Sanyan - Adults Only is set in Rhodes Town in the Dodecanese region, 400 metres from Akti Kanari Beach and 700 metres from Elli Beach. Boasting luggage storage space, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation offers a housekeeping service and private check-in and check-out for guests. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at the guest house also have free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a balcony. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Villa Sanyan - Adults Only offers a picnic area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mandraki Port, Deer Statues and The Street of Knights. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 12 km from Villa Sanyan - Adults Only.

name: Amira Hotel Rhodes
description: Located in Rhodes Town, 400 metres from Agia Marina Beach, Amira Hotel Rhodes provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe. Amira Hotel Rhodes offers certain rooms with pool views, and each room has a balcony. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. At Amira Hotel Rhodes you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and local cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. You can play tennis at Amira Hotel Rhodes, and bike hire and car hire are available. Zefyros Beach is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Temple of Apollon is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 13 km from Amira Hotel Rhodes.

name: Rose Hotel Faliraki
description: The family-run Rose Hotel Faliraki features an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and umbrellas. It provides a snack bar, BBQ facilities and studios with a balcony or terrace. A private bathroom is standard in all the units at Rose Hotel Faliraki. Each includes a kitchenette with cooking hobs, fridge and kitchenware. Some are interconnecting rooms, while others overlook the pool. Kids can play in the paddling pool and playground. Car and bike rentals can be arranged by the 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi access is available in public areas of the property. Rose Hotel Faliraki is 16 km from Diagoras Airport. Various supermarkets and shops are located nearby.

name: Filoxenia Apartments & Studios
description: Just 300 metres from the beach of Theologos in Rhodes, Filoxenia Apartments & Studios features 2 swimming pools and a Greek restaurant. It features self-catered accommodation with a balcony overlooking the gardens, the sea and the pools. A kitchenette with cooking facilities and fridge are included in all accommodation types at the Filoxenia. Each has a private bathroom with shower. Some units have a separate bedroom, and an extra bathroom. Air conditioning and safety box are provided upon charge. A la carte breakfast can be enjoyed daily at the dining area. Cocktails and coffee are served at the poolside bar. Lunch and dinner include family recipes made with local produce, such as spoon sweets and homemade liqueurs. Free sun loungers are provided on the terrace. Leisure options include petanque, mini golf and table tennis facilities. Younger guests can enjoy the playground and children’s pool. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Staff can arrange car rental to explore the Butterfly Valley 6 km away. Rhodes Town is 18 km away. Rhodes International Airport is within 5 km. Free private parking is possible on site and a bus stops right outside the property.

name: Hotel Mediterranean
description: Enjoying a privileged location, Hotel Mediterranean is situated on the sandy beach near the Aquarium and the Casino, a short distance from Rhodes Town and the Castle of the Knights. WiFi is offered throughout. The hotel has 241 spacious rooms and suites of high aesthetics, most of which offer wonderful views of the beach of Aquarium (Enydrio) and the deep blue of the Aegean Sea. Guests can enjoy relaxing around the freshwater pool or join in with water sport activities on Hotel Mediterranean's sandy beach. The hotel's services and facilities include a card room and a video and TV room. Thalasa restaurant, with pleasingly fresh decor surroundings, proposes carefully selected Greek and International dishes. The Mediterranean Cafe serves coffee, drinks and light snacks all day with background music in the evenings. The Mediterranean is situated just 30 minutes by car from Rhodes International Airport and 5 minutes by car from Rhodes port. This location provides easy access to the nearby Dodecanese Islands and neighbouring Turkey.

name: Mazoren Art Hotel
description: Mazoren Art Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and bar in Faliraki. The property is situated 2.2 km from Faliraki Beach, 2.4 km from Katafygio Beach and 2.9 km from Kathara Beach. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a mountain view. Mazoren Art Hotel provides some units with sea views, and the rooms come with a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. Temple of Apollon is 12 km from the accommodation, while Mandraki Port is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 14 km from Mazoren Art Hotel.

name: Island Boutique Hotel (Adults Only)
description: Island Boutique Hotel is located just across Elli Beach in Rhodes Town, 700 metres from Mandraki Port. Fine Mediterranean and international cuisine can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant. Refreshing cocktails are served at the property's bar. Modern and highly aesthetic, the rooms at Island Boutique Hotel open to a balcony with panoramic Aegean Sea and Rhodes views. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room includes a private bathroom. Island Boutique Hotel features free WiFi. The hotel also offers motorbike hire and car hire. The Street of Knights is 1 km from Island Boutique Hotel, while Grand Master's Palace is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 13 km from Island Boutique Hotel.

name: Castellum Suites
description: Property Location When you stay at Continental Hotel Apartments in Rhodes, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Clock Tower and Andreas Papandreou Park. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Collachium and Rhodes St. Francis Church.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 71 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include refrigerators and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.Dining Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.WebBeds

name: Annapolis Inn
description: Centrally located in Rhodes Town and within 300 metres from the lively Elli Beach, Annapolis Inn offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. It includes a pool with sun terrace and a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The air-conditioned apartments of Annapolis are bright and airy, each with a kitchenette and a dining area. Featuring tiled floors, all units include a fridge and a coffee maker. Marble bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a rich buffet breakfast served at the on-site restaurant. A variety of local and Mediterranean dishes can also be enjoyed during lunch and dinner. The hotel’s bar offers beverages, drinks and cocktails throughout the day. Leisure facilities include a swimming pool with children’s section and billiards. A business centre and a mini market can be found in hotel’s premises. Car rental and tailoring services are also available. Annapolis Inn is situated within 1 km from both Rhodes Medieval Town and Mandraki Port. Diagoras International Airport is at 13 km, while Rhodes Casino is located 300 metres away.

name: All Senses Ocean Blue Sea Side Resort
description: Located in Ialysos, The Ocean Blue Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Rhodes. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at The Ocean Blue Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at The Ocean Blue Hotel.Agoda

name: Rodos Park
description: Looking across Rhodes’ medieval city, this 5-star hotel offers delightful gardens, an outdoor pool and full spa and beauty treatments. The spacious, air-condiotioned rooms and suites are beautiful decorated, and their balconies overlook either the parks and/or the pool, or an archeological area. Each comes with an LCD TV set, a safe and wired internet access. Guests can rejuvenate at the wellness spa with one of the many beauty treatments and massages on offer. A bio sauna, hot tub, emotional showers and hair salon are featured. Mediterranean tastes are served at La Brasserie restaurant with its great pool view. The Galaxy Roof Lounge Bar, one of the trendiest places in town for cocktails, offers view to the Medieval Town and the Castle of the Knights. Rodos Park Suites is 16 km from Diagoras, the International Airport of Rhodes, and 5 minutes' walk from the medieval city, the commercial -business district and the shopping area.

name: Valsami Hotel Apartments
description: Valsami Hotel Apartments features a pool, a poolside bar and a restaurant amidst its blossomed garden. It also includes a mini market, a gift shop and a games room with billiards. All air-conditioned apartments of Valsami open out to a furnished balcony or patio overlooking the pool or the garden. Each unit features a kitchenette with fridge and a private bathroom stocked with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A TV with satellite channels is also available. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool and enjoy a cold coffee or a fresh juice at the poolside bar. Light meals and drinks are available at the snack bar, while Mediterranean dishes are also served at the on-site restaurant. Valsami Hotel Apartments lies within 6 km from Rhodes International Airport and 7 km from Rhodes Town. The famous Valley of Butterflies is at 18 km, while the lively Faliraki is 18 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Lindian Village Beach Resort, Curio Collection By Hilton
description: Our Lardos Beach resort features native gardens and a private beach. Outdoor spaces highlight Rhodian-style rooms, some have private pools. Enjoy local, Asian, and Italian cuisines, spa treatments, and wellness activities. We’re five kilometers from a nature reserve, and The Medieval City of Rhodes, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is an hour away.Hilton

name: Decan Concept Boutique Estate
description: Well located in the Rhodes Old Town district of Rhodes Town, DECAN Concept Boutique Estate is located 1.1 km from Elli Beach, 400 metres from The Street of Knights and 400 metres from Clock Tower. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at DECAN Concept Boutique Estate can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Grand Master's Palace, Mandraki Port and Deer Statues. The nearest airport is Rhodes International, 13 km from DECAN Concept Boutique Estate, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Athineon Hotel
description: Athineon Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Rhodes, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, outdoor pool, kids club, pool (kids), garden. Athineon Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Rhodes unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Sotirakis Hotel Studios
description: Sotirakis Studios is just a 15-minute walk from the beach of Faliraki. The complex offers spacious studios and a large pool surrounded by sun terrace and palm trees. The bright studios of Sotirakis are furnished in traditional Greek style and have private balconies with view. Each is air-conditioned and has a kitchenette with fridge and tea/coffee maker. The hotel has a restaurant, bar, mini market and a shop selling traditional items. Guests of Sotirakis Studios also enjoy a TV room, an internet corner and a Wi-Fi hotspot at the lobby. A free 2-way shuttle service to the beach is available. Faliraki beach and water sports facilities are less than 1 km away while the lively town centre is a 10-minute walk. The springs of Kallithea, the water park and Anthony Quinn Beach are just 2 km from the hotel.
